channel.title: 每日一句 on 每日一句英文 DailyEng
channel.description: Recent content in 每日一句 on 每日一句英文 DailyEng

item.title: 声望与微信形影不离。
item.description:
英文短句：

Popularity is the slutty little cousin of prestige, my friend.

item.title: 成为天才是不够的，改变人们的想法更需要勇气。
item.description:
英文短句：

Being genius is not enough, it takes courage to change people's hearts.

item.title: 生命就像一盒巧克力，你永远无法知道下一个是什么味道的。
item.description:
英文短句：

Life was like a box of chocolates, you never know what you're gonna get.

item.title: 昨日之日不可留，明日之日未可知，今日之日胜礼物
item.description:
英文短句：

Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, and today is a gift.

item.title: 每个人都会死去,但不是每个人都真正活过。
item.description:
英文短句：

Every man dies, not every man really lives.

item.title: 生活没有目标就像航海没有指南针。
item.description:
英文短句：

Living without an aim is like sailing without a compass

item.title: 生活中最大的幸福是坚信有人爱我们。
item.description:
英文短句：

The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved

item.title: 生活就像故事一样：不在乎长短，而在于质量，这才是最重要的。
item.description:
英文短句：

As is a tale, so is life: not howlong it is, but how good it is, is what matters.

item.title: 生命可以归结为一种简单的选择：要么忙于生存，要么赶着去死。
item.description:
英文短句：

I guess it comes down to a simple choice:get busy living or get busy dying…

item.title: 金牌选手不会从天而降，你必须用热爱、刻苦和投入来浇灌他们。
item.description:
英文短句：

Medalist don't grow on trees， you have to nurture them with love, with hard work, with dedication.

item.title: 为了活下来，要拼尽全力，生命本就不仅仅是为你自己。
item.description:
英文短句：

Do all you can to survive, because life is never something you live only for yourself.

item.title: 人一生中出人头地的机会不多，一旦有了一定要抓住！
item.description:
英文短句：

Sometimes your whole life boils down to one insane move.

item.title: 成功一番事业的唯一途径是热爱自己的事业，如果你还没找到的话，继续寻找，不要屈就。
item.description:
英文短句：

The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.

item.title: 希望是美好的，也许是人间至善，而美好的事物永不消逝。
item.description:
英文短句：

Hope is a good thing and maybe the best of things. And no good thing ever dies.

item.title: 自信是会传染的，缺乏自信也是。
item.description:
英文短句：

Confidence is contagious. So is a lack of confidence.

item.title: 科学是井然有序的知识，智慧是井然有序的生活。
item.description:
英文短句：

Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.

item.title: 做的愈多，你会做的就愈多。
item.description:
英文短句：

The more things you do, the more you can do.

item.title: 下决心取得胜利的人绝不会说“不可能”。
item.description:
英文短句：

The man who has made up his mind to win will never say impossible.

item.title: 如果你很有天赋，勤勉会使其更加完善；如果你能力一般，勤勉会补足其缺陷。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you have great talents, industry will improve them; if you have but moderate abilities, industry will supply their deficiency.

item.title: 当你相信自己的理由是正当的，就要有勇气守住立场。
item.description:
英文短句：

When you are convinced that your cause is right, have the courage to take a stand.

item.title: 做事绝不要感到害怕，如果它是对的。
item.description:
英文短句：

You must never be fearful about what you are doing when it is right.

item.title: 一次痛苦的经验抵得上无数次的警告。
item.description:
英文短句：

One thorn of experience is worth a whole wilderness of warning.

item.title: 有成就的人显少等着让事情在他们身上发生，他们出门造就事情的发生。
item.description:
英文短句：

People of accomplishment rarely sat back and let things happen to them. They went out and happened to things.

item.title: 停止奋斗，你就停止了生活。
item.description:
英文短句：

Cease to struggle and you cease to live.

item.title: 喜欢或不喜欢同样的事，这决定友谊是否坚固。
item.description:
英文短句：

To like and dislike the same things, this is what makes a solid friendship.

item.title: 事情很少是不可能的；人们之所以不成功，与其说是条件不够，不如说是决心不够。
item.description:
英文短句：

Few things are impossible in themselves, and it is often for want of will, rather than of means, that man fails to succeed.

item.title: 如果你有某种天份，保护好它。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you've got a talent, protect it.

item.title: 每天试着让自己比早上起床时更有智慧一点。
item.description:
英文短句：

Spend each day trying to be a little wiser than you were when you woke up.

item.title: “立冬”节气，在每年的11月7日或8日。每年的这个时候，中国的河流开始结冰。
item.description:
英文短句：

Winter Begins arrives on November 7 or November 8 each year. At this time of the year, some rivers in China start to freeze.

item.title: 我所学到的是，如果你相信看长远，属于你的那一天终究会来临。
item.description:
英文短句：

What I've learned here is that if you believe in the long term, your day eventually arrives.

item.title: 命运给予我们的不是失望之酒，而是机会之杯。因此，让我们毫无畏惧，满心愉悦地把握命运。
item.description:
英文短句：

Our destiny offers not the cup of despair, but the chalice of opportunity. So let us seize it, not in fear, but in gladness.

item.title: 一个人可以失败很多次，但是只要他没有开始责怪旁人，他还不是一个失败者。
item.description:
英文短句：

A man can fail many times, but he isn't a failure until he begins to blame somebody else.

item.title: 胜利是不会向我们走来的，我必须自己走向胜利。
item.description:
英文短句：

Victory won't come to me unless I go to it.

item.title: 我不缅怀过去的历史，而致力于未来的梦想。
item.description:
英文短句：

I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.

item.title: 万圣节这天，你可以尽情享受，或荒唐可笑，或令人害怕，或举止古怪，而你从中也会受益良多。
item.description:
英文短句：

Halloween gives you permission to be silly, to be terrifying, to be weird, and in fact it rewards you for it.

item.title: 即使是最疲惫的河流，历经曲折，也终会安然入海。
item.description:
英文短句：

Even the weariest river winds somewhere safe to sea.

item.title: 要完全相信，我们首先得怀疑。
item.description:
英文短句：

To believe with certainty, we must begin with doubting.

item.title: 给他一条鱼，你可以喂他一天；教他钓鱼，他周末就不会再来缠你了。
item.description:
英文短句：

Give a man a fish, and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, and you get rid of him on the weekends.

item.title: 真正的科学首先教人怀疑和知道自己无知。
item.description:
英文短句：

True science teaches, above all, to doubt and be ignorant.

item.title: 真理没有自己特定的时间段。它的时间永远是现在。
item.description:
英文短句：

Truth has no special time of its own. Its hour is now always.

item.title: 越来越老并不可怕，可怕的是让人觉得越来越老。
item.description:
英文短句：

Growing old is not upsetting; being perceived as old is.

item.title: 真理是美的；毫无疑问，谎言也是如此。
item.description:
英文短句：

Truth is beautiful. Without doubt, and so are lies.

item.title: 生活中没有可怕的东西，只有应去了解的东西。
item.description:
英文短句：

Nothing in life is to be feared. It is only to be understood.

item.title: 科学知识要求完全不受个人感情的影响。
item.description:
英文短句：

Scientific knowledge aims at being wholly impersonal.

item.title: 只有爱才能使原子的力量造福人类，而非危害人类。
item.description:
英文短句：

Love alone can release the power of the atom, so it will work for man and not against him.

item.title: 每个故事都可以从两个方面看，至少两个方面。
item.description:
英文短句：

There are two sides to every story, at least.

item.title: 想象不应该脱离现实。
item.description:
英文短句：

Imagination is not to be divorced from the facts.

item.title: 以爱心聚在一起的十个人能够完成一万个分散的人做不到的事情。
item.description:
英文短句：

Ten men banded together in love can do what ten thousand separately would fail in.

item.title: 当我们为一去不复返的青春叹息时，我们应该考虑将来的衰老。
item.description:
英文短句：

When we sighing for the loss of our past youth, which will return no more, let us reflect that decrepitude will come.

item.title: 重要的原则能够也必须是灵活的。
item.description:
英文短句：

Important principles may and must be flexible.

item.title: 死亡只不过是从一个房间进入另一个房间。
item.description:
英文短句：

Death is no more than passing from one room into another.

item.title: 时间是个多才多艺的表演者。它能展翅飞翔，能阔步前进，能治愈创伤，能消逝而去，也能揭示真相。
item.description:
英文短句：

Time is a versatile performer. It flies, marches on, heals all wounds, runs out and will tell.

item.title: 永远也不能依照过去来计划将来。
item.description:
英文短句：

You can never plan the future by the past.

item.title: 任何一种不幸都无法与时间的失去相比。
item.description:
英文短句：

No other misfortune can be compared with the loss of time.

item.title: 把握时间就是节约时间。
item.description:
英文短句：

To choose time is to save time.

item.title: 不是无知本身，而是对无知的无知，才是知识的死亡。
item.description:
英文短句：

Not ignorance, but the ignorance of ignorance, is the death of knowledge.

item.title: 金钱可以充饥，但不能治愈不幸。食物可以饱腹，但却不能满足灵魂的需求。
item.description:
英文短句：

Money can cure hunger, it cannot cure unhappiness. Food can satisfy the appetite, but not the soul.

item.title: 真理不需色彩，美丽不需涂饰。
item.description:
英文短句：

Truth needs no color; beauty, no pencil.

item.title: 如果你说的话并非发自你的内心，你就不可能触动别人的心弦。
item.description:
英文短句：

You'll never move others, heart to heart, unless your speech comes from your heart.

item.title: 有时候你能做的最紧急重要的事情就是彻底休息。
item.description:
英文短句：

Sometimes the most urgent and vital thing you can possibly do is to take a complete rest.

item.title: 友谊既是快乐之源泉，又是健康之要素。
item.description:
英文短句：

Friendship is both a source of pleasure and a component of good health.

item.title: 人生最大的幸福是坚信有人爱我们。
item.description:
英文短句：

The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved.

item.title: 为你自己的观点辩护吧，但不要相信它们会包含全部的真理或唯一的真相。
item.description:
英文短句：

Fight for your opinions, but do not believe that they contain the whole truth or the only truth.

item.title: 让逝者拥有不朽的荣誉，让生者拥有不朽的爱情。
item.description:
英文短句：

Let the dead have the immortality of fame, but the living the immortality of love.

item.title: 教育不是注满一桶水，而是点燃一把火。
item.description:
英文短句：

Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.

item.title: 我们要尽可能为生活增加一些东西，而不是从中索取什么。
item.description:
英文短句：

We are here to add what we can to life, not to get what we can from it.

item.title: 当遗憾替代梦想的时候，人开始变老。
item.description:
英文短句：

A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.

item.title: 只有对自己有信心的人才会对他人守信。
item.description:
英文短句：

Only a person who has faith in himself is able to be faithful to others.

item.title: 财富与满足很少能同时拥有。拿走财富吧，我宁愿只要满足。
item.description:
英文短句：

Content and riches seldom meet together. Riches take thou, contentment I had rather.

item.title: 如果你认为自己行，你就一定行。如果你认为自己不行，那你是对的。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you think you can, you can. And if you think you can't, you're right.

item.title: 只有经历尝试与磨难，灵魂才能坚强，视野才会清晰，才能激起雄心，获取胜利。
item.description:
英文短句：

Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, vision cleared, ambition inspired, and success achieved.

item.title: 我们的生活都被琐事浪费掉了，简单点，简单点。
item.description:
英文短句：

Our life is frittered away by detail, simplify it, simplify it.

item.title: 别哭泣，别叹息，别呻吟；悲伤唤不回流逝的时光。
item.description:
英文短句：

Weep no more, no sigh, nor groan. Sorrow calls no time that's gone.

item.title: 行为发展成习惯，习惯发展成为性格，性格伴随人的一生。
item.description:
英文短句：

Sow an act, and you reap a habit. Sow a habit, and you reap a character. Sow a character, and you reap a destiny.

item.title: 没有播种，何来收获；没有辛劳，何来成功；没有磨难，何来荣耀；没有挫折，何来辉煌。
item.description:
英文短句：

No pain, no palm; no thorns, no throne; no gall, no glory; no cross, no crown.

item.title: 我们最值得自豪的不在于从不跌倒，而在于每次跌倒之后都爬的起来。
item.description:
英文短句：

Our greatest glory consists not in never falling but in rising every time we fall.

item.title: 如果你想走到高处，就要使用自己的两条腿!不要让别人把你抬到高处;不要坐在别人的背上和头上。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you would go up high, then use your own legs! Do not let yourselves carried aloft; do not seat yourselves on other people's backs and heads.

item.title: 掌握智慧的重点在于学会选择性地忽视。
item.description:
英文短句：

The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook.

item.title: 挑战自己的认知。你的认知是你观望世界的窗；不时擦拭，光线才能穿透。
item.description:
英文短句：

Begin challeging your own assumptions. Your assumptions are your windows on the world. Scrub them off every once in a while, or the light won’t come in.

item.title: 天生我材必有用。若只有声音最悦耳的鸟儿在歌唱，树林该多沉寂。
item.description:
英文短句：

Use what talents you possess: the woods would be very silent if no birds sang there except those that sang best.

item.title: 一如阳光必须聚焦方能生热，要全神贯注方能完成当下的工作。
item.description:
英文短句：

Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun’s rays do not burn until brought to a focus.

item.title: 今天的怀疑是对明日成就的唯一限制，让我们怀着坚定和积极的信念面对吧。
item.description:
英文短句：

The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today. Let us move forward with strong and active

item.title: 如果你用双手工作，你是一个劳力；如果你用双手和头脑工作，你是一个工匠；如果你用双手和头脑工作，并且全身投入，你就是一个艺术家。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you put out your hands, you are a laborer; if you put out your hands and mind, you are a craftsperson; if you put out your hands, mind, heart and soul, you are an artist.

item.title: 人经过努力可以改变世界，这种努力可以使人类达到新的、更美好的境界。没有人仅凭闭目、不看社会现实就能割断自己与社会的联系。
item.description:
英文短句：

The world can be changed by man's endeavor, and that this endeavor can lead to something new and better. No man can sever the bonds that unite him to his society simply by averting his eyes.

item.title: 只有有耐心圆满完成简单工作的人，才能够轻而易举地完成困难的事。
item.description:
英文短句：

Only those who have the patience to do simple things perfectly ever acquire the skill to do difficult things easily.

item.title: 要理解人生，需要向后看，但要更好地活着必须向前看。
item.description:
英文短句：

Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.

item.title: 历史使人明智;诗词使人灵秀;数学使人周密;自然哲学使人深刻;伦理使人庄重;逻辑修辞学使人善辨。
item.description:
英文短句：

Histories make men wise; poems witty; the mathematics subtle; natural philosophy deep; moral grave; logic and rhetoric able to contend.

item.title: 一些理想为我指引过道路，并不断给我新的勇气以面对人生的准则，也就是——真、善、美。
item.description:
英文短句：

The ideals which have lighted my way, and time after time have given me new courage to face life cheerfully, have been kindness, beauty and truth.

item.title: 我们每个人都生活在各自的过去中，人们会用一分钟的时间去认识一个人，用一小时的时间去喜欢一个人，再用一天的时间去爱上一个人，到最后呢，却要用一辈子的时间去忘记一个人。
item.description:
英文短句：

We all live in the past. We take a minute to know someone, one hour to like someone, and one day to love someone, but the whole life to forget someone.

item.title: 教育不是为了教会青年人谋生，而是教会他们创造生活。
item.description:
英文短句：

In education we are striving not to teach youth to make a living, but to make a life.

item.title: 用珠宝打扮自己，不如用知识充实自己。
item.description:
英文短句：

With jewelry dress up oneself, is inferior to equip themselves with knowledge.

item.title: 在这个世界上只有两种悲剧：一种是得不到自己想要的东西，另一种是得到了。
item.description:
英文短句：

In this world there are only two tragedies. One is not getting what one wants, and the other is getting it.

item.title: 人的本能是追逐从他身边飞走的东西，却逃避追逐他的东西。
item.description:
英文短句：

The instinct of a man is to pursue everything that flies from him, and to fly from all that pursue him.

item.title: 不要悲伤！因为上帝在最绝望的时刻给我们带来希望。不要忘记，最大的雨来自最黑暗的云。
item.description:
英文短句：

Don't be sad! Because God sends hope in the most desperate moments. Don't forget, the heaviest rain comes out of the darkest clouds.

item.title: 曾经拥有的，不要忘记。不能得到的，更要珍惜。属于自己的，不要放弃。已经失去的，留作回忆。
item.description:
英文短句：

Don’t forget the things you once owned. Treasure the things you can’t get. Don't give up the things that belong to you and keep those lost things in memory.

item.title: 真相是一种美丽又可怕的东西，需要格外谨慎地对待。
item.description:
英文短句：

The truth is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution.

item.title: 所有幸福的家庭都相似，而每个不幸的家庭各不同。
item.description:
英文短句：

Happy families are all alike; every unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.

item.title: 失去的东西到最后总有办法回来的，尽管有时会出乎我们的意料。
item.description:
英文短句：

The things we lose have a way of coming back to us in the end, if not always in the way we expect.

item.title: 有些人能清楚地听到自己内心深处的声音，并以此行事。这些人要么变成了疯子，要么成为传奇。
item.description:
英文短句：

Some people hear their own inner voices with great clearness. And they live by what they hear. Such people become crazy, or they become legends.

item.title: 最具有可塑性的寄生生物是什么？是细菌吗？是病毒吗？是肠虫吗？其实是人的想法。
item.description:
英文短句：

What is the most resilient parasite? Bacteria? A virus? An intestinal worm? An idea.

item.title: 如果世界上少一些同情，世界上也就会少一些麻烦。
item.description:
英文短句：

If there were less sympathy in the world, there would be less trouble in the world.

item.title: 一个人可以失败很多次，但是只要他没有开始责怪旁人，他还不是一个失败者。
item.description:
英文短句：

A man can fail many times, but he isn't a failure until he begins to blame somebody else.

item.title: 不要只因一次挫败，就放弃你原来决心想达到的目的。
item.description:
英文短句：

Do not, for one repulse, forgo the purpose that you resolved to effort.

item.title: 当人们令你失望，你更要勇往直前，因为早晨到来，又是阳光灿烂的一天。
item.description:
英文短句：

And when they let you down,you get up off the ground. Cause morning rolls around. And it's another day of sun.

item.title: 好的爱情是你透过一个人看到全世界，坏的爱情是你为了一个人放弃全世界。
item.description:
英文短句：

Good love makes you see the whole world from one person while bad love makes you abandon the whole world for one person.

item.title: 我觉得有些人只对生活的艰苦灰心丧气，因此把时间都浪费在灰心丧气里，我们称之为愤怒，对事物的整体视而不见，对于所有能够成功的微小元素视而不见。
item.description:
英文短句：

I think people just get frustrated without harsh, life can be. So they're spending their time dwelling on that frustration we calling it anger. keep their eyes shut to the wholeness of the situation.

item.title: 人生的目的在于服务他人、同情怜悯和乐于助人。
item.description:
英文短句：

The purpose of human life is to serve, and to show compassion and the will to help others.

item.title: 奇迹有时候是会发生的，但是你得为之拼命地努力。
item.description:
英文短句：

Miracles sometimes occur, but one has to work terribly for them.

item.title: 雨会停，夜有终，伤会消。希望其实一直等待着我们去寻找。
item.description:
英文短句：

The rain will stop, the night will end, the hurt will fade. Hope is never so lost that it can't be found.

item.title: 爱的次数不需多，只需真爱。真爱需要时间去经营，需要用心去了解，需要胸襟去包容。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you really love someone, the whole life will not be enough. You need time to know, to forgive and to love. All this needs a very big mind.

item.title: 尽管失败和挫折等待着人们，一次次地夺走青春的容颜，但却给人生的前景增添了一份尊严，这是任何顺利的成功都不能做到的。
item.description:
英文短句：

The failures and reverses which await men-and one after another sadden the brow of youth-add a dignity to the prospect of human life, which no Arcadian success would do.

item.title: 只有强者才懂得争斗；弱者甚至失败都不够资格，而是生来就是被征服的。
item.description:
英文短句：

Strength alone knows conflict, weakness is below even defeat, and is born vanquished.

item.title: 不要害怕你的生活将要结束，应该担心你的生活永远还未真正开始。
item.description:
英文短句：

Fear not that the life shall come to an end, but rather fear that it shall never have a beginning.

item.title: 卓越的天才不屑走旁人走过的路。他寻找迄今未开拓的地区。
item.description:
英文短句：

Towering genius disdains a beaten path. It seeks regions hitherto unexplored.

item.title: 幸福，不是长生不老，不是大鱼大肉，不是权倾朝野。幸福是能够实现每个小愿望，饿的时候有的吃，需要爱的时候有人爱。
item.description:
英文短句：

Happiness is not about being immortal nor having food or rights in one's hand. It’s about having each tiny wish come true, or having something to eat when you are hungry or having someone's love when you need love.

item.title: 生活没有目标，犹如航海没有罗盘。
item.description:
英文短句：

Living without an aim is like sailing without a compass.

item.title: 一个人总要走陌生的路，看陌生的风景，听陌生的歌，然后在某个不经意的瞬间，你会发现，原本是费尽心机想要忘记的事情真的就那么忘记了。
item.description:
英文短句：

One is always on a strange road, watching strange scenery and listening to strange music. Then one day, you will find that the things you try hard to forget are already gone.

item.title: 雨后必见太阳。这就是生活。正如痛苦过后必见快乐。
item.description:
英文短句：

After the rain, the sun will reappear. There is life. After the pain, the joy will be here.

item.title: 战火硝烟中的背叛与我们在太平盛世中的背叛相较而言，就天真单纯得多了！
item.description:
英文短句：

There are betrayals in war that are childlike compared with our human betrayals during peace.

item.title: 未来就是有待发生的可能性。它等待着人类的想象力将这些可能变成现实。
item.description:
英文短句：

The future is simply infinite possibility waiting to happen. What it waits on is human imagination to crystallize its possibilities.

item.title: 世上有些丰功伟绩之所以能缔造，是因为有些人不够“聪明”，不知道那些原是不可能的。
item.description:
英文短句：

Some of the world's greatest feats were accomplished by people not smart enough to know they were impossible.

item.title: 局限只存在于我们的大脑中。可是如果我们运用自己的想象力，就会获得无限的可能性。
item.description:
英文短句：

Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.

item.title: 成功没有秘诀。它源自充分的准备，努力地工作，来自从失败中汲取的教训。
item.description:
英文短句：

There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work and learning from failure.

item.title: 如果时间是最宝贵的东西，浪费时间应该是最大的挥霍。
item.description:
英文短句：

If time being of all things the most precious, wasting time must be the greatest prodigality.

item.title: 无法充分掌握时间、区别事情的缓急先后，你所做的一切都大打折扣
item.description:
英文短句：

If you are not in good control of time or cannot set priorities for different matters, what you do is surely to be rebated.

item.title: 每一天都以无限的可能开始，我们本身决定着这一天是否进步或者安心。
item.description:
英文短句：

Every new day begins with possibilities. It's up to us to fill it with the things that move us toward progress and peace.

item.title: 这是我的一个秘密，一个再简单不过的秘密：一个人只有用心去看，才能看到真实。事情的真相仅凭肉眼是无法看穿的。
item.description:
英文短句：

And now here is my secret, a very simple secret: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye.

item.title: 人们认为作家的想象力永不枯竭，所以他能够源源不断地创作出各种事件和情节，并且他们创作的故事仅仅是凭空而造的。
item.description:
英文短句：

People think the writer's imagination is always at work, that he's constantly inventing an endless supply of incidents and episodes; that he simply dreams up his stories out of thin air.

item.title: 我知道，你永远都不会原谅我。我不怪你，换做我，我也不会原谅我自己。 我又无知，又不负责，心胸也十分狭窄。
item.description:
英文短句：

I know you'll never forgive me, and I don't blame you. I wouldn't forgive me either. I was ignorant and irresponsible and small-minded.

item.title: 每当你觉得想要批评什么人的时候，你且要记着，这个世界上的人并非都具备你禀有的条件。
item.description:
英文短句：

Whenever you feel like criticizing anyone,” he told me, “just remember that all the people in this world haven’t had the advantages that you’ve had.

item.title: 天才等于百分之一的灵感加百分之九十九的汗水。
item.description:
英文短句：

Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.

item.title: 要重视你的敌人，因为他们总是能第一个发现你的错误。
item.description:
英文短句：

Pay attention to your enemies, for they are the first to discover your mistakes.

item.title: 粗鲁只是恐惧的表现。人们恐惧无法得到所期望的。最可怕的、不招人喜爱的人也只是需要被爱，那么他们便会像花儿般绽放。
item.description:
英文短句：

Rudeness is merely the expression of fear. People fear they won't get what they want. The most dreadful and unattractive person only needs to be loved, and they will open up like a flower.

item.title: 如果你想活着，你需要培养一种坚强的精神态度
item.description:
英文短句：

If you wish to survive, you need to cultivate a strong mental attitude.

item.title: 领导者和跟随者的区别在于是否有创新能力。
item.description:
英文短句：

Innovation distinguishes between the leader and the follower.

item.title: 不到地球毁灭那一刻，我们都得做好本职工作。
item.description:
英文短句：

Until such time as the world ends, we will act as though it intends to spin on.

item.title: 无礼只是恐惧的一种表露。
item.description:
英文短句：

Rudeness is merely an expression of fear.

item.title: 无论哪个地区的和平遭到破坏，世界各国的和平都会受到威胁。
item.description:
英文短句：

When peace has been broken anywhere, the peace of all countries everywhere is in danger.

item.title: 我很骄傲能与你们每个人共同服役，你们有权享受永远快乐的和平生活。
item.description:
英文短句：

I'm proud to have served with each and every one of you. You deserve long and happy lives in peace.

item.title: 每个人都受两种教育，一种来自别人，另一种更重要，是来自自己。
item.description:
英文短句：

Every person has two educations, one which he receives from others, and one, more important, which he gives to himself.

item.title: 人类一个简单的念头可以创造城市。一个念头可以改变世界，重写规则。
item.description:
英文短句：

A single idea from the human mind can build cities. An idea can transform the world and rewrite all the rules.

item.title: 听说人在死前的一秒钟，其一生会闪过眼前。其实不是一秒，而是无尽的时间，时间海洋。
item.description:
英文短句：

I had always heard your entire life flashes in front of your eyes the second before you die. First of all, that one second isn’t a second at all, it stretches on forever, like an ocean of time.

item.title: 虽然世界多苦难，但是苦难总是能战胜的。
item.description:
英文短句：

Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.

item.title: 如果没有你，如此的良辰美景让我去向何人诉说？
item.description:
英文短句：

Without you, today's emotions would be the scurf of yesterday's.

item.title: 人一生中出人头地的机会不多，一旦有了一定要抓住机会！
item.description:
英文短句：

Sometimes your whole life boils down to one insane move.

item.title: 生活的悲剧不在于人们受多少苦，而在于人们错过了什么。
item.description:
英文短句：

The tragedy of life is not so much what men suffer, but what they miss.

item.title: 回去告诉整个英格兰，苏格兰儿女不再是他们的臣民，告诉他们苏格兰是自由的。
item.description:
英文短句：

Go back to England, and tell them there, that Scotland's daughters and sons are yours no more. Tell them Scotland is free.

item.title: 在有限的钢琴上，我自得其乐，我过惯那样的日子了。
item.description:
英文短句：

You played out your happiness on a piano that was not infinite. I learned to live that way.

item.title: 我为瑞恩的母亲由衷感到悲哀，我愿意用我和弟兄们的生命去拯救你的生命来减轻她的苦痛。
item.description:
英文短句：

I feel heartfelt sorrow for the mother of Private James Ryan and am willing to lay down my life and the lives of my men – especially you, Reiben – to ease her suffering.

item.title: 不创造幸福的人无权享用幸福，正如不创造财富的人无权享用财富一样。
item.description:
英文短句：

We have no more right to consume happiness without producing it than to consume wealth without producing it.

item.title: 这才是人性的本质，你们内心渴望被征服，疲于追逐光鲜的自由，而丢失了生活的乐趣，迷失在权利的角逐，就为获得认同。
item.description:
英文短句：

It's the unspoken truth of humanity that you crave subjugation. The bright lure of freedom diminishes your life's joy in a mad scramble for power, for identity.

item.title: 我可以拿走人的任何东西，但有一样不行，这就是在特定环境下选择自己的生活态度的自由。
item.description:
英文短句：

Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of human freedoms- to choose one's attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one's own way.

item.title: 初恋的人们心存紧张并满怀柔情，但却可以抵御一切—— 只因为心如烈火！
item.description:
英文短句：

New lovers are nervous and tender, but smash everything- for the heart is an organ of fire.

item.title: 读好书，如同与先哲们交谈。
item.description:
英文短句：

The reading of all good books is like a conversation with the finest minds of past centuries.

item.title: 我所能奉献的没有其他，只有热血、辛劳、眼泪与汗水。
item.description:
英文短句：

I have nothing to offer but blood, toil, tears and sweat.

item.title: 只有在这种神秘的爱情方程中，才能找到逻辑或原由。
item.description:
英文短句：

It is only in the mysterious equations of love that any logic or reasons can be found.

item.title: 人必须相信自己，这是成功的秘诀。
item.description:
英文短句：

You have to believe in yourself. That's the secret.

item.title: 一首伟大的诗犹如一座喷泉，不断地喷出智慧和快乐的泉水
item.description:
英文短句：

A great poem is a fountain forever overflowing with the waters of wisdom and delight.

item.title: 如果我们有勇气去追求，所有的梦想都可以现实。
item.description:
英文短句：

All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

item.title: 命运给予我们的不是失望之酒,而是机会之杯. 因此,让我们毫无畏惧,满心愉悦地把握命运。
item.description:
英文短句：

Our destiny offers not the cup of despair, but the chalice of opportunity. So let us seize it, not in fear, but in gladness.

item.title: 只有少数人能做到独立自主；那是强者的特权。
item.description:
英文短句：

It is the business of the very few to be independent; it is a privilege of the strong.

item.title: 如果世上真的有什么奇迹，那么一定是去理解他人和与人分享。
item.description:
英文短句：

If there is any kind of magic in the world, it must be the attempt of understanding someone or sharing something.

item.title: 不管发生什么，不管今天看起来多么糟糕，生活都会继续，明天会更好。
item.description:
英文短句：

No matter what happens, or how bad it seems today, life does go on, and it will be better tomorrow.

item.title: 你们必须努力寻找自己的声音，因为你越迟开始寻找,找到的可能性就越小。
item.description:
英文短句：

You must strive to find your own voice. Because the longer you wait to begin, the less likely you are to find it at all.

item.title: 我宁愿住在乡村小镇上自得其乐，而不愿和人一起挤在天鹅绒的坐垫上。
item.description:
英文短句：

I would rather sit on a pumpkin and have it all to myself, than be crowded on a velvet cushion.

item.title: 暴风雨的乌云可能会聚集，星辰可能会碰撞，可是我会永远爱你直到地老天荒。
item.description:
英文短句：

Storm clouds may gather and stars my collide but I love you until the end of time.

item.title: 时间可以吞噬一切，但它丝毫无法减少的是你伟大的思想，你的幽默，你的善良还有你的勇气。
item.description:
英文短句：

Time erodes all such beauty but what it cannot diminish is the wonderful workings of your mind, your humor, your kindness and your moral courage.

item.title: 当你被某个人吸引时，那只是意味着你俩在潜意识里互相吸引。
item.description:
英文短句：

When you meet someone and you're attracted to them, it just means that your subconscious is attracted to their subconscious, subconsciously.

item.title: 哪怕是世界末日，我都会爱着你。
item.description:
英文短句：

In spite of you and me and the whole silly world going to pieces around us, I love you.

item.title: 幸福不在于拥有金钱，而在于获得成就时的喜悦以及产生创造力的激情。
item.description:
英文短句：

Happiness lies not in the mere possession of money, it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.

item.title: 当时他还太年轻，不知道人内心会删除糟糕的记忆、放大美好的记忆。也正是因为这个功能，我们才能背负着过去的负担前行。
item.description:
英文短句：

He was still too young to know that the heart's memory eliminates the bad and magnifies the good, and that thanks to this artifice we manage to endure the burden of the past.

item.title: 在超离是非之处有座花园，我会在那里与你相遇。
item.description:
英文短句：

Somewhere beyond right and wrong, there is a garden, I will meet you there.

item.title: 与其说人类的幸福来自偶尔发生的鸿运，不如说来自每天都有的小实惠。
item.description:
英文短句：

Human felicity is produced not so much by great pieces of good fortune that seldom happen, as by little advantages that occur every day.

item.title: 若我想与你共度余生，我希望我的余生尽早开始。
item.description:
英文短句：

I came here tonight because when you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.

item.title: 紫罗兰把它的香气留在那踩扁了它的脚踝上，这就是宽恕。
item.description:
英文短句：

Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.

item.title: 这世界真是个好地方，值得为它奋斗。
item.description:
英文短句：

The world is a fine place and worth fighting for.

item.title: 我必须时刻提醒自己有些鸟儿注定不会被关在牢笼里，它们的每一片羽毛都闪耀着自由的光辉。
item.description:
英文短句：

I have to remind myself that some birds aren't meant to be caged. Their feathers are just too bright.

item.title: 所有这些瞬间，都将湮没于时间的洪流中。就像泪水消逝在雨中一样。死期到了。
item.description:
英文短句：

All those moments will be lost in time, like tears in rain. Time to die.

item.title: 热爱大自然的人内外感觉协调一致，即使进入成年后依然保持着童心。
item.description:
英文短句：

The lover of nature is he whose inward and outward senses are still truly adjusted to each other; who has retained the spirit of infancy even into the era of manhood.

item.title: 年纪越大我就越不相信那句教条：年龄带给人智慧。
item.description:
英文短句：

The older I grow the more I distrust the familiar doctrine that age brings wisdom.

item.title: 变老无关乎物质，只在乎心灵。如果自己不介意，那么没人会在意。
item.description:
英文短句：

Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.

item.title: 你在把自己的幸福拱手相让去追求一些根本不会让你幸福的东西。
item.description:
英文短句：

You're throwing away happiness with both hands and reaching out for something that will never make you happy.

item.title: 我的朋友，你的心好似这潭湖水，如果波澜起伏就会模糊不清，不过当它平静下来，答案就清澈见底了。
item.description:
英文短句：

Your mind is like this water, my friend. When it is agitated, it becomes difficult to see. But if you allow it to settle, the answer becomes clear.

item.title: 成就一番伟业的唯一途径就是热爱自己的事业。如果你还没找到，继续寻找不要放弃。跟随自己的心，总有一天你会找到。
item.description:
英文短句：

The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking.

item.title: 懦怯囚禁人的灵魂，希望可以令你感受自由。强者自救，圣者渡人。
item.description:
英文短句：

Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free. It takes a strong man to save himself, and a great man to save another.

item.title: 死亡只是生命的一部分，是我们注定要做的一件事。
item.description:
英文短句：

Death is just a part of life, something we're all destined to do.

item.title: 不要只因一次失败，就放弃你原来决心想要达到的目的。
item.description:
英文短句：

Do not, for one repulse, give up the purpose that you resolved to effect.

item.title: 和往常一样，我的朋友提醒我不要抱太大希望，但是这点很难做到。
item.description:
英文短句：

And as usual, my friend warned me not to cherish too big hope, but it is very difficult to do.

item.title: 真是个完美的晚上，我现在需要的就是给它来个完美的结束，比如说一小段贝多芬。
item.description:
英文短句：

It had been a wonderful evening and what I needed now, to give it a perfect ending, was a little of the Ludwig Van.

item.title: 没有伟大的意志力，便没有雄才大略。
item.description:
英文短句：

There is no such thing as a great talent without great will.

item.title: 除非你过得好，否则我是不会放手的，这就是我想要的。
item.description:
英文短句：

I can't turn away without knowing you'll be all right. That's all I want.

item.title: 你永远也不晓得自己有多喜欢一个人，除非你看见他和别人在一起。
item.description:
英文短句：

Not until you see someone couple up will you realize how much you love him.

item.title: 只要我闭上眼睛，就仿佛还能看到你站在那里，沐浴着黎明的曙光。
item.description:
英文短句：

In fact, if I close my eyes, I can still see you there just standing in the dawn light.

item.title: 最好的爱能唤醒灵魂启发我们追求卓越，在我们的心里种下热情的火苗，并带给我们心灵的平静。
item.description:
英文短句：

The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds.

item.title: 我认为生活就是上帝的恩赐。我不会白白浪费生命。让我们过好每一天！
item.description:
英文短句：

I figure life is a gift. I don’t intend on wasting it. To make each day count!

item.title: 我做任何事情不过是为了有所回报，我总要得到报酬。
item.description:
英文短句：

I never give anything without expecting something in return. I always get paid.

item.title: 是大地的泪点使她的微笑保持着青春不谢。
item.description:
英文短句：

It is the tears of the earth that keep her smiles in bloom.

item.title: 你怎知我等了你多久，就算是以死来换得与你厮守，我也愿意。
item.description:
英文短句：

You don't know how long I've waited for you. I'd rather die than stay away from you.

item.title: 我不同意你说的话，但我愿意誓死捍卫你说话的权利。
item.description:
英文短句：

I disapprove of what you say, but I will defend to the death your right to say it.

item.title: 只要一个人还有追求，他就没有老。直到后悔取代了梦想，一个人才算老。
item.description:
英文短句：

A man is not old as long as he is seeking something. A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.

item.title: 当我们在面对黑暗和死亡的时候，我们害怕的只是未知，除此之外，没有别的。
item.description:
英文短句：

It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness. Nothing more.

item.title: 上帝擦去他们所有的眼泪，不再有死亡，也不再有悲伤和生离死别，不再有痛苦，因往事已矣。
item.description:
英文短句：

God shall wipe away all the tears from their eyes, and there shall be no more death. Neither shall there be sorrow or dying, neither shall there be any more pain, for the former world has passed away.

item.title: 我们只有团结才会强大，如果分裂，便不堪一击。
item.description:
英文短句：

Only through unity can we have a strong, if the split, then a single blow.

item.title: 表现我们真正的自我，是我们自己的选择，这比我们所具有的能力更重要。
item.description:
英文短句：

It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

item.title: 如果我们在人生中体验的每一次转变都让我们在生活中走得更远，那么，我们就真正的体验到了生活想让我们体验的东西。
item.description:
英文短句：

If every unfolding we experience takes us further along in life, then, we are truly experiencing what life is offering.

item.title: 我所认为最深沉的爱，莫过于分开以后，我将自己，活成了你的样子。
item.description:
英文短句：

The most affectionate love I imagined is that I live as you used to be after you've gone away.

item.title: 事情愈艰难，最后愈能得到丰厚的果实。
item.description:
英文短句：

The more difficult something is, the more rewarding it is in the end.

item.title: 懂道理的人，终会按下自尊，坦诚他犯下严重错误的时刻。
item.description:
英文短句：

Here comes a point when a reasonable man will swallow his pride and admit that he's made a terrible mistake.

item.title: 在这个世界上取得成就的人，都努力去寻找他们想要的机会，如果找不到机会，他们便自己创造机会。
item.description:
英文短句：

The people who get on in this world are the people who get up and look for circumstances they want, and if they cannot find them, make them.

item.title: 命运给予我们的不是失望之酒，而是机会之杯。因此，让我们毫无畏惧，满心愉悦地把握命运。
item.description:
英文短句：

Our destiny offers not the cup of despair, but the chalice of opportunity. So let us seize it, not in fear, but in gladness.

item.title: 事情很少有根本做不成的；其所以做不成，与其说是条件不够，不如说是由于决心不够。
item.description:
英文短句：

Few things are impossible in themselves; and it is often for want of will, rather than of means, that man fails to succeed.

item.title: 我喜欢并习惯了对变化的东西保持着距离，这样才会知道什么是最不会被时间抛弃的准则。
item.description:
英文短句：

I love and am used to keeping a distance with those changed things. Only in this way can I know what will not be abandoned by time.

item.title: 一段不被接受的爱情，需要的不是伤心，而是时间，一段可以用来遗忘的时间。一颗被伤了的心，需要的不是同情，而是明白。
item.description:
英文短句：

An unacceptable love needs no sorrow but time- some time for forgetting. A badly-hurt heart needs no sympathy but understanding.

item.title: 等你获得真正属于你的幸福之后，你就会明白一起的伤痛其实是一种财富，它让你学会更好地去把握和珍惜你爱的人。
item.description:
英文短句：

When you finally get your own happiness, you will understand the previous sadness is a kind of treasure, which makes you better to hold and cherish the people you love.

item.title: 你每天都在做很多看起来毫无意义的决定，但某天你的某个决定就能改变你的一生。
item.description:
英文短句：

You make millions of decisions that mean nothing and then one day your order takes out and it changes your life.

item.title: 我不懂我们是否有着各自的命运，还是只是到处随风飘荡。
item.description:
英文短句：

I don't know if we each have a destiny, or if we're all just floating around accidentally like on a breeze.

item.title: 一个人可以失败很多次，但是只要他没有开始责怪旁人，他还不是一个失败者。
item.description:
英文短句：

A man can fail many times, but he isn't a failure until he begins to blame somebody else.

item.title: 尽管失败和挫折等待着人们，一次次地夺走青春的容颜，但却给人生的前景增添了一份尊严，这是任何顺利的成功都不能做到的。
item.description:
英文短句：

The failures and reverses which await men- and one after another sadden the brow of youth- add a dignity to the prospect of human life, which no Arcadian success would do.

item.title: 知识总是从爱好开始，犹如光总是从火开始一样。
item.description:
英文短句：

Love is ever the beginning of knowledge as fire is of light.

item.title: 如果你说的话并非发自你的内心，你就不可能触动别人的心弦。
item.description:
英文短句：

You'll never move others, heart to heart, unless your speech comes from your heart.

item.title: 读书是积累知识的基础。基础原理来源于书本，但须经实际生活的检验。
item.description:
英文短句：

The foundation of knowledge must be laid by reading. General principles must come from books, which, however, must be brought to the test of real life.

item.title: 如果你想成功，不要刻意地追求成功。只要你干自己热爱的工作并相信它，成功就自然会到来。
item.description:
英文短句：

Don't aim for success if you want it. Just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.

item.title: 既然人总是要死的，那就得讲究活法了。
item.description:
英文短句：

Since death is the destined terminal of human beings, how to finish the life road will really matter.

item.title: 很多事情只要努力就可以带给人快乐。有的地方能让你收获在心的不是食物，而是经历。
item.description:
英文短句：

There are many endeavors to bring pleasure to people. Some places are making something you take inside. Not the food, but the experience.

item.title: 有时候就是要经历一些糟糕的事情才能意识到世间存在的美丽。
item.description:
英文短句：

Sometimes it takes going through something so awful to realize the beauty that is out there in this world.

item.title: 生命中最艰难的阶段不是没有人懂你，而是你不懂你自己。
item.description:
英文短句：

The most difficult stage in life is not when no one understands you, but when you don't understand yourself.

item.title: 优于别人，并不高贵，真正的高贵应该是优于过去的自己。
item.description:
英文短句：

There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self.

item.title: 不管我们面对什么处境，不管我们的内心多么矛盾，我们总有选择。我们是什么样的人，取决于我们选择做什么样的人。
item.description:
英文短句：

No matter what situation we face, no matter how contradictory our hearts are, we always have a choice. What kind of person we are depends on who we choose to be.

item.title: 当幸福之门关上了，另一扇门也会为你打开；但就是我们一直在意关上的那扇门，而没有发现早已打开等待着我们的这一扇门。
item.description:
英文短句：

When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.

item.title: 面对敌人需要勇气，但敢于直面朋友，需要更大的勇气。
item.description:
英文短句：

It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to your enemies, but a great deal more to stand up to your friends.

item.title: 失败是一团迷雾，穿过它，我们可以瞥见胜利。
item.description:
英文短句：

Failure is the fog through which we glimpse triumph.

item.title: 别到处跟别人抱怨这个世界欠你什么，这个世界什么都不欠你的。
item.description:
英文短句：

Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing.

item.title: 人在恐惧的时候还能勇敢吗？人唯有恐惧的时候方能勇敢。
item.description:
英文短句：

Can a man still be brave if he's afraid? That is the only time a man can be brave.

item.title: 爱恋是只看到对方的好，而爱情是连对方的缺陷都包容。
item.description:
英文短句：

Affection is when you see someone's strength, love is when you accept someone's flaws.

item.title: 当你聆听音乐时，仿佛世界都变了。这种感觉就像是陷入爱情，只不过没有人会受伤。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you listen to the music, the world changes. It's like falling in love. Only no one gets hurt.

item.title: 母爱使孩子感到：降临人间是美好的；母爱在孩子身上逐渐灌输了对生命的热爱，而不仅仅希望活着就是了。
item.description:
英文短句：

A mother's love makes a child feel: the arrival of the world is beautiful; mother's love in the child gradually instill the love of life, and not just hope alive.

item.title: 认真做好的事情，即使非常简单却总是令人难忘。
item.description:
英文短句：

It's always the simple things, well executed, that are memorable.

item.title: 细数幸福的事情确实可以提醒我们生活中存在的美好，还能增加我们的幸福感，保持身心健康。
item.description:
英文短句：

Counting blessings can actually increase happiness and health by reminding us of the good things in life.

item.title: 朋友是什么？两幅躯壳拥有同一个灵魂。
item.description:
英文短句：

What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies.

item.title: 人若无名，便可专心练剑。
item.description:
英文短句：

Getting rid of the fetters of fame, one can concentrate on his technique.

item.title: 爱情不是寻找共同点，而是学会尊重不同点。
item.description:
英文短句：

Love is not about how find out the similarities, it is about how to respect the differences.

item.title: 既然没有A选项了，那让我们尽可能地利用B选项吧。
item.description:
英文短句：

Option A is not available. So let's just kick the shit out of Option B.

item.title: 你知道，有些鸟儿是注定不会被关在牢笼里的，它们的每一片羽毛都闪耀着自由地光辉。
item.description:
英文短句：

You know some birds are not meant to be caged, their feathers are just too bright.

item.title: 我选择直面问题，而不是逃避，因为英雄就是这么做的。
item.description:
英文短句：

I choose to run towards my problems, and not away from them. Because that is what heroes do.

item.title: 放开悲伤的回忆，才能拥抱更鲜活的世界。
item.description:
英文短句：

Letting go of sad and gloomy memories, then embracing a fresher and brighter world.

item.title: 这种平平淡淡的日常生活，老是这么日复一日的话，也挺苦的吧。
item.description:
英文短句：

Repeating this kind of dull life all the time, seemingly, I really live a very hard life.

item.title: 有时候你抓紧某些东西，并不是因为你想要留住它们，而是因为放手实在太难了。
item.description:
英文短句：

Sometimes you hold onto things, not because you want to keep them, but because they are difficult to let go.

item.title: 冰柱不是严寒的象征，而是天气变暖的标志。
item.description:
英文短句：

Icicle is not a symbol o chillness but a sign of warming.

item.title: 一份同样的工作，因为心态不同，既可能精彩，也可能痛苦。
item.description:
英文短句：

Faced with a same job, it is your attitude that gives you surprise or sorrow.

item.title: 如果人与人交往只想着利益得失，那么相识相知的愉悦也就不复存在了。
item.description:
英文短句：

If people in the communications only think about gains and losses of interest, then the pleasure of knowing each other will cease to exist.

item.title: 人是从苦难中成长起来的，唯有乐观奋斗，才能不断茁壮，反之则易埋没。
item.description:
英文短句：

Most people grow up from sufferings, with optimistic attitude to struggle, one can thrive, otherwise one will be abandoned by his or her own life.

item.title: 我们说了再见，但这也意味着，在广阔天空之下，我们又可以开启另一段疯狂探险。
item.description:
英文短句：

It's goodbye, but we lean forward to the next crazy venture beneath the skies.

item.title: 与人分享的快乐才是真正的快乐！
item.description:
英文短句：

Happiness is only real when shared!

item.title: 如果你想造一艘船，先不要雇人收集木头，也不要给人分配任务，而是激发他们对海洋的渴望。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you want to build a ship, don't drum up people to collect wood and don't assign them tasks and work, but rather long for the endless immensity of sea.

item.title: 傻瓜不知道这事儿是不可能的，所以他做到了。
item.description:
英文短句：

The fool didn't know it was impossible, so he did it.

item.title: 台上一分钟，台下十年功。
item.description:
英文短句：

One minute on the stage needs ten years practice off stage.

item.title: 今日事须今日毕，切勿拖延到明天。
item.description:
英文短句：

Never deter till tomorrow that which you can do today.

item.title: 人类有一件真正有力的武器，那就是笑。
item.description:
英文短句：

The human race has one really effective weapon, and that is laughter.

item.title: 皱纹应该只是微笑留下的印记。
item.description:
英文短句：

Wrinkles should merely indicate where smiles have been.

item.title: 善良是一种聋子能听见、盲人能看见的语言。
item.description:
英文短句：

Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.

item.title: 船停在港湾固然安全，但这并不是船的初衷。
item.description:
英文短句：

A ship is safe in harbor, but that's not what ships are for.

item.title: 山间公路教会你人生中非常重要的一课，看似到了尽头，实际通常只是个弯道。
item.description:
英文短句：

Roads in the mountains teach you a very important lesson in life. What seems like an end is very often just a bend.

item.title: 人生苦短，何必留仇。
item.description:
英文短句：

It seems like life is too short to hold grudges.

item.title: 我们的故事由我们自己决定，轮不到别人对你指手画脚。
item.description:
英文短句：

We get to decide what our story is. Nobody else gets to tell you what your story is.

item.title: 生活就像冰淇淋，在融化之前好好享用它。
item.description:
英文短句：

Life is like an ice cream, enjoy it before it melts.

item.title: 兴趣是锚，我相信它最终会带来和平，甚至幸福。
item.description:
英文短句：

Interests are anchors, and I believe they will bring peace and even happiness in the end.

item.title: 你不能选择怎样死或什么时候死，你只能决定现在怎样生活。
item.description:
英文短句：

You don't get to choose how you're going to die, or when. You can only decide how you're going to live now.

item.title: 如果你仔细寻找，就会发现爱无处不在。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you look for it, I've got a sneaky feeling you'll find that love actually is all around.

item.title: 你可能很难想象：当你出生时命运就已经注定了是什么感觉。
item.description:
英文短句：

It's probably hard for you to imagine how it feels to have your destiny be predetermined at birth.

item.title: 腾不出时间娱乐的人，早晚会被迫腾出时间生病。
item.description:
英文短句：

People who cannot find time for recreation are obliged sooner or later to find time for illness.

item.title: 人永远都长不大。他们只是看起来像大人而已，但这只不过是时光雕塑出来的泥娃娃。
item.description:
英文短句：

No one ever grows up. They may look grown-up, but it's just the clay of time.

item.title: 不要急着长大，尽可能地做一个孩子吧。
item.description:
英文短句：

Don't be in a hurry to grow up. Hold on to being a boy as long as you can.

item.title: 真正的勇者不是没有恐惧，他们只是明白有比恐惧更重要的东西。
item.description:
英文短句：

Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the judgment that something else is more important than fear.

item.title: 即使是无意识的，人也总是在朝着自己想去的方向前进。虽然前进的步伐实际上是很缓慢的，但从结果来看，却是出人意料的迅速。
item.description:
英文短句：

Though unconsciously, people are indeed moving towards their destination. Slow as the progress, seen from the result, it may be surprisingly fast.

item.title: 要想成为公主，你得相信自己就是一个公主。你应该像你所想象中的公主那般行事。因此，你得高瞻远瞩，微笑待人，享受生活。
item.description:
英文短句：

To be a princess, you have to believe that you are a princess. You've got to walk the way you think a princess would walk. So, you gotta think tall; you gotta smile, wave, and just have fun.

item.title: 要站在人类大多数的一边才不会被看作异类，遵循人们生活规律的轨迹才会被人类社会容纳。
item.description:
英文短句：

It seems that standing on the side of majority won't be called alien, following the track of most people's life rules can be accepted by the society.

item.title: 别人评判你的往往是成功的次数，没有人会特别在意你失败了多少次。而我成功的记录和屡败屡战的记录成正比。
item.description:
英文短句：

I am not judged by the number of times I fail, but by the number of times I succeed; and the number of times I succeed is in direct proportion to the number of times I fail and keep trying.

item.title: 规则存在是有原因的：如果你遵循它们，你可能会成功；如果你不遵循它们，你可能会毁灭世界。
item.description:
英文短句：

Rules existed for a reason: if you followed them, you would succeed; if you didn't, you might burn the world to the ground.

item.title: 当你拥有足够多的时候，你要做好心理准备，因为在未来的某一天里你可能什么都没有了。
item.description:
英文短句：

When you have much enough, you must accept that you could have little someday.

item.title: 快乐的秘密就是知道在适当的时候保持沉默。
item.description:
英文短句：

The key to happiness in life is knowing when to keep your mouth shut.

item.title: 你所嫌弃的，可能是别人拼命想要得到的。你以为失败的人生，也许是别人努力活着的结果。
item.description:
英文短句：

What you disdained may be the life other people strive for, and the failed life you meant may be what other people have painstakingly earned.

item.title: 在我们的旅途中，我们会发现自己置身于新的地理位置，也获得了新的心灵空间；乘马车观光亦是如此。
item.description:
英文短句：

When we are travelling, we find ourselves in new places and new spaces, physically and internally; it is the same with coaching.

item.title: 纵然伤心，也不要愁眉不展，因为你不知谁会爱上你的笑容。
item.description:
英文短句：

Never frown, even when you are sad, because you never know who is falling in love with your smile.

item.title: 流逝的时光就像淙淙的小河里奔腾的水，你再也无法感受同一捧水，无论你有多么希望。
item.description:
英文短句：

Time gone is like the flowing water of a gurgling river, where even if one wishes one cannot touch the same water again.

item.title: 一次只关注一件事，你将会拥有一切，但不能一次就全部实现。
item.description:
英文短句：

Focus on one thing at a time. You can have it all but not all at once.

item.title: 如果一个人丢掉了过去，他就无法找到未来。
item.description:
英文短句：

If a person loses the past, he can't find the future.

item.title: 我希望人生的进度条能够再慢一点，如果可以竭尽全力走完，我不想奔跑。
item.description:
英文短句：

I wish the progress bar of my life could move more slowly that I can spare no effort to walk to the end instead of running after time.

item.title: 虽然辛苦，我还是会选择那种滚烫的人生。
item.description:
英文短句：

Though life is hard, I want it to be boiling.

item.title: 如果你迷失了自我，请深呼吸，迷失或许能成为你人生的转折点，让你发现真实的自己，并让你知道自己想要成为怎样的人。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you feel lost, just take a deep breath and realize that being lost can be burning point of finding out who you truly are, and what you truly want to do.

item.title: 喜欢就会放肆，但爱就是克制。
item.description:
英文短句：

You will be licentious, if you only like someone. But if you love someone, you will be restrained.

item.title: 和往常一样，我惊讶的发现，离别是如此的简单，出发的感觉是那么的美妙。世界突然充满了可能性。
item.description:
英文短句：

I was surprised, as always, that how easy the act of leaving was, and how good it felt. The world was suddenly rich with possibility.

item.title: 一个人的首要职责是什么？答案很简单：做自己。
item.description:
英文短句：

What is the man's first duty? The answer is brief: to be himself.

item.title: 天无绝人之路。
item.description:
英文短句：

God never shuts one door but he opens another.

item.title: 我们所能做的，我们真正需要做的就是倾听自己的心声。当我们想让一切好起来的时候，唯一重要是找到适合我们的方法。
item.description:
英文短句：

All we can do, for the moment is really we need to do-listen to ourselves. When we are trying to get better, the only truth that matters is what works for.

item.title: 我们说了再见，但这也意味着，在广阔天空之下，我们又可以开启另一段疯狂探险。
item.description:
英文短句：

It's goodbye, but we lean forward to the next crazy venture beneath the skies.

item.title: 当你原谅他人时，你便是在爱人。当你爱人时，上帝的光芒会照耀着你。
item.description:
英文短句：

When you forgive, you love. And when you love, God's light shines on you.

item.title: 对于人的精神来说，赞扬就像阳光一样，没有它我们便不能开花生长。
item.description:
英文短句：

Praise is like sunlight to the human spirit, we cannot flower and grow without it.

item.title: 自命不凡者，脑中被其所知的少数事物所占据，以致没有空间去容纳无数其所不知的事物。
item.description:
英文短句：

Swelled heads are so preoccupied with the few things they know, so that there is no room left for the innumerable things they don't know.

item.title: 世界上最宽阔的是海洋，比海洋更宽阔的是天空，比天空更宽阔的是人的胸怀。
item.description:
英文短句：

There is a prospect greater than the sea, and it is the sky; there is a prospect greater than the sky, and it is the human soul.

item.title: 不患人之不己知，患不知人也。
item.description:
英文短句：

I will not be afflicted at men's not knowing me; I will be afflicted that I do not know men.

item.title: 要设身处地地为别人着想，如果一双鞋你穿着夹脚，别人的感觉可能也一样。
item.description:
英文短句：

Always put yourself in the other's shoes. If you feel that it hurts you, it probably hurts the person too.

item.title: 最好的朋友就是那种能和你促膝而坐，彼此不说只言片语，分别时却感到这是你有过的最好的一次交流。
item.description:
英文短句：

The best kind of friend is the kind you can sit on a porch swing with, never say a word, and then walk away feeling like it was the best conversation you've ever had.

item.title: 你不能改变你的过去，但你可以让你的未来变得更好。一旦时间浪费了，生命就浪费了。
item.description:
英文短句：

You cannot improve your past, but you can improve your future. Once time is wasted, life is wasted.

item.title: 人生的价值，并不是用时间，而是用深度去衡量的。
item.description:
英文短句：

The value of life, not with time, but with the depth to be measured.

item.title: 年轻人的可敬之处在于勇气和远大前程。
item.description:
英文短句：

The respectability of youth lies in their courage and great expectation.

item.title: 不登高山，不知天之高也；不临深溪，不知天之厚也。
item.description:
英文短句：

Do not know how high the sky is until one climbs up the tops of mountains, and do not know how thick the earth is until one comes to the deep river.

item.title: 我们必须接受失望，因为它是有限的，但千万不可失去希望，因为它是无穷的。
item.description:
英文短句：

We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.

item.title: 一个人可以把马带到河边，但他不能令它饮水。
item.description:
英文短句：

A man may lead a horse to the water, but he cannot make it drink.

item.title: 如果你花费过多的时间去想某件事，那么你将永远也不会完成它。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.

item.title: 如果你热爱生活就不要浪费时间，因为时间是生活的组成部分。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.

item.title: 你的时间有限，所以不要浪费时间去过别人的生活。
item.description:
英文短句：

Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.

item.title: 决定我们成为什么样的人，不是我们的能力，而是我们的选择。
item.description:
英文短句：

It is not our abilities that show what we truly are, but our choices.

item.title: 对于大多数人来说，他们认定自己有多幸福，就有多幸福。
item.description:
英文短句：

Most folks are about as happy as they make up their minds to be.

item.title: 如果你想走到高处，就要用自己的两条腿！不要让别人把你抬到高处；不要坐在别人的背上和头上。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you would go high, then use your own legs! Do not let yourselves carried aloft; do not seat yourselves on other people's backs and heads.

item.title: 在一个链条里，最弱的一环也可能是最强的，因为它可以使整个链条断掉。
item.description:
英文短句：

The weakest link in a chain is the strongest because it can break it.

item.title: 你梦想成为什么样的人，你就能成为什么样的人。你今时今日所处的位置都是基于你所信赖和梦想的一切。
item.description:
英文短句：

You become what you believe. You are where you are today in your life based on everything you have believed.

item.title: 与其说人类的幸福来自偶尔发生的鸿运，不如说来自每天都有的小实惠。
item.description:
英文短句：

Human felicity is produced not so much by great pieces of good fortune that seldom happen, as by little advantages that occur every day.

item.title: 不要只因一次失败，就放弃你原来决心想到达的目的。
item.description:
英文短句：

Do not, for one repulse, give up the purpose that you resolved to effect.

item.title: 世界犹如一面镜子：朝它皱眉的话，它就朝你皱眉；朝它微笑，它也朝你微笑。
item.description:
英文短句：

The world is like a mirror: when you frown at it, it frowns at you; when smile, it smiles too.

item.title: 如果你竭尽全力，你就不用担心失败。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you are doing your best, you will not have to worry about failure.

item.title: 人们有时以为失去了什么，其实没有，只是被移开了。
item.description:
英文短句：

Sometimes people think they lose things and they didn't really lose them. It just gets moved.

item.title: 在白天对什么都不动感情是极为容易的，但在夜晚就是另外一回事了。
item.description:
英文短句：

It is awfully easy to be hard-boiled about everything in the daytime, but at night it is another thing.

item.title: 每个人都有向往的时候，渴望比以前更美好，更高贵，更神圣的东西。
item.description:
英文短句：

There is not a heart but has its moments of longing, yearning for something better, nobler and holier than it knows before.

item.title: 爱就是当你坐在他身边，哪怕什么都不做，也会感觉很开心。
item.description:
英文短句：

Love is when you sit beside someone doing nothing yet you feel perfectly happy.

item.title: 有些爱情故事不会成为史诗，有些只是短篇小说，但同样都满溢着爱。
item.description:
英文短句：

Some love stories aren't epic novels. Some are short stories, but that doesn't make them any less filled with love.

item.title: 我不想要你将就，我也不想成为将就的对象。
item.description:
英文短句：

I don't want to be someone that you're settling for. I don't want to be someone that anyone settles for.

item.title: 现在我发现自己活在一个比死还痛苦的世界，一个无我容身之处的世界。
item.description:
英文短句：

Now I find myself in a world which for me is worse than death. It is a world in which there is no place for me.

item.title: 并不是你生命中的男人有价值，而是你与他在一起的生命。
item.description:
英文短句：

It's not the man in your life that counts but the life in your man.

item.title: 我喜欢早上起来时一切都是未知的，不知会遇见什么人，会有什么样的结局。
item.description:
英文短句：

I love waking up in the morning, not knowing what's going to happen, or whom I'm going to meet, where I'm going to wind up.

item.title: 不要放弃你的幻想。当幻想没有了以后，你还可以生存，但是你虽生犹死。
item.description:
英文短句：

Don't part with your illusions. When they are gone, you may still exist. But you have ceased to live.

item.title: 懒惰像生锈一样，比操劳更能消耗身体。
item.description:
英文短句：

Sloth, like rust, consumes faster than labor wear.

item.title: 越是煎熬，越刻骨铭心，爱了就要受苦，明知没有结果。
item.description:
英文短句：

The bigger the man, the deeper his imprint. And if he loves, he suffers, knowing it's a dead-end street.

item.title: 世界上对勇气的最大考验是忍受失败而不丧失信心。
item.description:
英文短句：

The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.

item.title: 目标并不一定总是用于去达成的，很多时候它仅仅是为了给你方向感。
item.description:
英文短句：

A goal is not always meant to be reached, and it often serves simply as something to aim at.

item.title: 你玩权利的游戏，结局要么赢、要么死。没有其他选择。
item.description:
英文短句：

When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die. There is no middle ground.

item.title: 对，过去是痛楚的，但我认为你要么可以逃避，要么可以向它学习。
item.description:
英文短句：

Yes, the past can hurt. But I think you can either run from it or learn from it.

item.title: 宇宙的基本准则之一：金无足赤，人无完人。这世上不存在所谓的“完美”。没了这种“不完美”，你我将不复存在。
item.description:
英文短句：

One of the basic rules of the universe is that nothing is perfect. Perfection simply doesn't exist…..Without imperfection, neither you nor I would exist.

item.title: 光勤劳是不够的，蚂蚁也是勤劳的。要看你为什么而勤劳。
item.description:
英文短句：

It is not enough to be industrious, so are the ants. What are you industrious for?

item.title: 我从来不回头看，因为那样会让我对现在分心。
item.description:
英文短句：

I never look back. It distracts from the now.

item.title: 当你发现你想和某个人共度余生时，你会想要余生快点开始。
item.description:
英文短句：

When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.

item.title: 过去是我们给自己下的定义。我们有很好的理由去努力摆脱它，或是摆脱其中不好的部分，但摆脱它的唯一途径是——在其中添加更好的东西。
item.description:
英文短句：

The past is our definition. We may strive, with good reason, to escape it or what is bad in it, but we will escape it only by adding things better to it.

item.title: 人生如喜剧，人人皆化妆假面，扮演各自角色，直到戏毕离场。
item.description:
英文短句：

What else is the whole life of mortals but a sort of comedy, in which the various actors, disguised by various costumes and masks, walk on and play each one his part, until the manager waves them off the stage.

item.title: 思想上的缺陷和弱点正如身体上的创伤，就算用尽一切办法将其治愈，仍然会留下疤痕。
item.description:
英文短句：

The defects and faults of the mind are like wounds in the body. After all imaginable care has been taken to heal them up, still there will be a scar left behind.

item.title: 懦怯囚禁人的灵魂，希望可以解救人的自由。强者自救，圣者渡人。
item.description:
英文短句：

Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free. A strong man can save himself. A great man can save another.

item.title: 命运给予我们的不是失望之酒，而是机会之杯。
item.description:
英文短句：

Our destiny offers not the cup of despair, but the chalice of opportunity.

item.title: 深夜来临的时候，是一个人心灵最脆弱的时候，也是思念最疯狂的时候。其实一个人并不孤单，想念一个人的时候才是真正的孤单。
item.description:
英文短句：

Night comes, is one of the most vulnerable, when the mind is also thinking of the most crazy time. In fact, a person is not alone miss when a person is really alone.

item.title: 发生在你身上的一切均非偶然。你从生活中得到了什么，源于你给予了什么。
item.description:
英文短句：

Life doesn't just happen to you; you receive everything in your life based on what you've given.

item.title: 世人万千种，浮云莫去求，斯人如彩虹，遇上方知有。
item.description:
英文短句：

But every once in a while you find someone who's iridescent, and when you do, nothing will compare.

item.title: 世界上所有的生命都在微妙的平衡中生存。
item.description:
英文短句：

Everyone you see exists together in a delicate balance.

item.title: 时间一直走，没有尽头，只有路口。
item.description:
英文短句：

Time goes by, there is no end, only the intersection.

item.title: 好好去做吧，站在世界之巅!
item.description:
英文短句：

Made it, Ma! Top of the world!

item.title: 只有强者才懂得斗争；弱者甚至失败都不够资格，而是生来就是被征服的。
item.description:
英文短句：

Strength alone knows conflict, weakness is below even defeat, and is born vanquished.

item.title: 卓越的天才不屑走旁人走过的路，他寻找迄今未开拓的地区。
item.description:
英文短句：

Towering genius disdains a beaten path. It seeks regions hitherto unexplored.

item.title: 只有每天再度战胜生活并夺取自由的人，才配享受生活和自由。
item.description:
英文短句：

None is of freedom or of life deserving unless he daily conquers it anew.

item.title: 世上最成功的人往往都是失败最多的人。
item.description:
英文短句：

Some of the most successful people in the world are the ones who've had the most failures.

item.title: 我的一生一次又一次失败过，而那正是我成功的原因。
item.description:
英文短句：

I have failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

item.title: 幸福不在于拥有金钱，而在于获得成就时的喜悦以及产生创造力的激情。
item.description:
英文短句：

Happiness lies not in the mere possession of money, it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.

item.title: 生活中最大的幸福是坚信有人爱我们。
item.description:
英文短句：

The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved.

item.title: 要真正了解一个人，需在不幸中考察他。
item.description:
英文短句：

To really understand a man, we must judge him in misfortune.

item.title: 有时候正是人们以为的无用之人成就无人敢想之事。
item.description:
英文短句：

Sometimes it is the very people who no one imagines anything of who do the things that no one can imagine.

item.title: 我本可以忍受黑暗，如果我不曾见过太阳。
item.description:
英文短句：

Had I not seen the sun, I could have borne the shade.

item.title: 我们笑着说再见，却深知再见遥遥无期。
item.description:
英文短句：

We laughed and kept saying see you soon, but inside we both knew we'd never see each other again.

item.title: 记住：不要依赖梦想而忘记生活。
item.description:
英文短句：

It does not do well to depend on dreams and forget to live, remember that.

item.title: 真相有时之所以难以被接受，是因为谎言听起来美好多了。
item.description:
英文短句：

Sometimes it's hard to accept the truth because the lies sound so much better.

item.title: 最难过的日子也有尽头。
item.description:
英文短句：

The longest day has an end.

item.title: 我不能掌控他人的恐惧，只能掌控自己的。
item.description:
英文短句：

I can't control their fear, only my own.

item.title: 生活从来没有容易的答案，只有去克服重重问题。
item.description:
英文短句：

There are no easy answers, there's only living through the questions.

item.title: 我愿意为你赴死，但不会指望你而活。
item.description:
英文短句：

I would die for you. But I wouldn't live for you.

item.title: 天地之大，比你所能梦想到的更多。
item.description:
英文短句：

There are more things in heaven and earth than you've ever dream of.

item.title: 一个人可以选择爱上谁，当他要结束爱情时，他是没有选择的。
item.description:
英文短句：

A man has free choice to begin love, but not to end it.

item.title: 如果你睁开眼睛，你会看到值得看的东西。
item.description:
英文短句：

If your eyes are opened, you will see the things worth seeing.

item.title: 我们都要做很多选择，最终这些选择创造了我们。
item.description:
英文短句：

We all make choices, but in the end our choices make us.

item.title: 正确的训练加上坚定的决心，你将攻无不克。
item.description:
英文短句：

With the right kind of coaching and determination you can accomplish anything.

item.title: 失败了没关系，重振旗鼓，从头再来。
item.description:
英文短句：

If at first you don't succeed, then dust yourself off and try again.

item.title: 生命短暂，放慢脚步，别错过任何沿途的风景。
item.description:
英文短句：

Life is too short to miss out anything, try to take it slowly.

item.title: 月之圆，兆人之团圆。
item.description:
英文短句：

The moon becomes round, which indicates the reunion of people.

item.title: 正因为你为你的玫瑰花费了时间，这才使你的玫瑰变得如此重要。
item.description:
英文短句：

It is the time you have wasted for your rose that makes your rose so important.

item.title: 你不能为取悦别人而活，你得有自己的选择。
item.description:
英文短句：

You cannot live your life to please others. The choice must be yours.

item.title: 永远别让旁人说你成不了事，就算是我也不行。
item.description:
英文短句：

Don't ever let somebody tell you you can't do something, not even me.

item.title: 只要一息尚存，就不得不战。
item.description:
英文短句：

As long as you can still grab a breath, you fight.

item.title: 愿你不再孤单，并学会享受孤独。
item.description:
英文短句：

May you not be lonely but be able to enjoy being alone.

item.title: 以友情计岁月，而非年龄；以笑容量人生，而非泪水。
item.description:
英文短句：

Count your age by friends, not years; Count your life by smiles, not tears.

item.title: 我从未真正意识到我该抉择的是：活在别人的剧本还是叙写自己的人生。
item.description:
英文短句：

I never really noticed that I had to decide, to play someone's game or live my own life.

item.title: 每一个遭受痛苦的地方就是我要去的地方，做任何我能做到事。
item.description:
英文短句：

Anywhere I see suffering, that is where I want to be, doing what I can.

item.title: 我们虽然年少，但却如此相爱。让我们披荆斩棘，跨越所有障碍。
item.description:
英文短句：

We are still kids but we are so in love, fighting against all odds.

item.title: 岁月不过是一条长河，从你我的过往穿流而过。
item.description:
英文短句：

Time is but a river flowing from our past.

item.title: 延长白天最好的办法，就是从夜晚偷时间。
item.description:
英文短句：

The best of all ways to strengthen our days is to steal hours from the night.

item.title: 教育的目的应是把人心转化为活的泉水，而不是贮水池。
item.description:
英文短句：

The aim of education should be to convert the mind into living fountain, and not a reservoir.

item.title: 很奇妙的一种感觉是：曾经的陌生人，突然之间成为了你的整个世界。
item.description:
英文短句：

It's an amazing feeling to realize how one person who was once just a stranger suddenly meant the world to you.

item.title: 我也许不能改变过去，但我能从中学习。
item.description:
英文短句：

I may not be able to change the past, but I can learn from it.

item.title: 一个人总要走陌生的路，看陌生的风景，听陌生的歌。总有一天，在某个不经意的瞬间，你会发现，曾经努力想要忘记的事情早已消逝。
item.description:
英文短句：

One is always on a strange road, watching strange scenery and listening to strange music. Then one day, you will find that the things you try hard to forget are already gone.

item.title: 一个频频回头的人，是走不了远路的。
item.description:
英文短句：

One who frequently looks back can't go far.

item.title: 我们是美之爱好者，但我们的趣味是淡雅的；我们陶冶性灵，但我们也不让失却丈夫气。
item.description:
英文短句：

For we are lovers of the beautiful,yet simple in our tastes; and we cultivate the mind without loss of manliness.

item.title: 被轻蔑的时候能平静一笑，这是一种自信。
item.description:
英文短句：

Having a calm smile to face with being disdained indicates kind of confidence.

item.title: 我想像不出，在孩提时代，还有什么需要会像渴求父亲保护一样强烈。
item.description:
英文短句：

I cannot think of any need in childhood as strong as the need for a father's protection.

item.title: 我们最深的恐惧是我们的力量无可估量。
item.description:
英文短句：

Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure.

item.title: 理性和非理性是互补的。两者分开的话，力量就会小很多。
item.description:
英文短句：

The rational and the irrational complement each other. Individually, they are far less powerful.

item.title: 找不到朋友时，为什么不翻翻书呢？
item.description:
英文短句：

If you are alone, why not seek the company of books?

item.title: 我们的生活是由机遇所界定的，甚至是那些我们错失的机遇。
item.description:
英文短句：

Our lives are defined by opportunities, even the one we miss.

item.title: 书籍是灵魂的镜子。
item.description:
英文短句：

Books are the mirrors of the soul.

item.title: 个人对集体努力的承诺，它造就团队合作、公司运作、社会协作，文明工作。
item.description:
英文短句：

Individual commitment to a group effort – that’s what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.

item.title: 你可以赚取很多的钱，但是你不能赢得更多的时间。
item.description:
英文短句：

You will always be able to make more money, but you cannot make more time.

item.title: 真正让你后退的，不是前面的困难，而是后面的退路。
item.description:
英文短句：

What really makes you backward is not the difficulty in front, but the way back.

item.title: 如果你生来就与众不同，何苦非要融入这群乌合之众？
item.description:
英文短句：

Why are you trying so hard to fit in when you were born to stand out?

item.title: 不要让自己一天忙忙碌碌，最终却碌碌无为。
item.description:
英文短句：

Don't let yourself get busy all day and end up doing nothing.

item.title: 生活有两种方式：一种是没有奇迹发生；另一种则是到处是奇迹。
item.description:
英文短句：

There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.

item.title: 做一个特别简单的人，不期待突如其来的好运，经营好自己，珍惜眼前的时光！
item.description:
英文短句：

Be an especially simple person, do not expect good luck coming suddenly, manage yourself well and cherish time at the moment.

item.title: 年年岁岁花相似，岁岁年年人不同。
item.description:
英文短句：

The flowers are similar every year, but people are different from year to year.

item.title: 使人疲惫的不是远方的高山，而是鞋里的一粒沙子。
item.description:
英文短句：

Make you tired of the mountain is not far away, but a grain of sand in my shoes.

item.title: 生命不息，奋斗不止。
item.description:
英文短句：

Aspire to inspire until I expire.

item.title: 无法描述你的形状，我感觉到你包围着我。因为你的存在，我满眼都是爱意。我的心变得柔软，只因你无处不在。
item.description:
英文短句：

Unable to perceive the shape of you, I find you all around me. Your presence fills my eyes with your love, it humbles my heart. For you are everywhere.

item.title: 让我们离开人寰，去更遥远的未来，带我穿越漆黑的夜空，坠入那无边的黑暗。
item.description:
英文短句：

Let's leave the world behind. Take me through the night. Fall into the dark side.

item.title: 我喜欢我身体破碎的声音和不断愈合的过程。
item.description:
英文短句：

I love the broken sound in my body and the healing process.

item.title: 我不知道我爱你的理由是什么，但我知道你是我不爱其他人的理由。
item.description:
英文短句：

I don't know the reason why I love you, but I know you are the reason why I don't love others.

item.title: 既然选择了远方，便只顾风雨兼程。
item.description:
英文短句：

Since I have chosen to go far, I will just walk down the path I have chosen step by step.

item.title: 人非圣贤，孰能无过。
item.description:
英文短句：

To err is human, to forgive is divine.

item.title: 人不应该是插在花瓶里供人观赏的静物，而是蔓延在草原上随风起舞的韵律。
item.description:
英文短句：

People should not be inserted lives in the vase for people to watch, but spread on the prairie wind dance rhythm.

item.title: 破晓黎明延续至晃晃白昼，宝贵如金也难以保留。
item.description:
英文短句：

So dawn goes down to day, nothing gold can stay.

item.title: 当你还能付出时不要放弃，任何事都不会真正结束直到你停止努力的那一刻。
item.description:
英文短句：

Don't give up when you still have something to give, nothing is really over until the moment you stop trying.

item.title: 当我年轻的时候，我想成为除我之外的任何人。但我必须接受我自己，我的缺点，我的一切。
item.description:
英文短句：

When I was young, I wanted to be anybody but myself. I would have to accept myself, my warts and all.

item.title: 沉重的担子是由那些有着坚强的肩膀的人来挑的。
item.description:
英文短句：

Burdens are for shoulders strong enough to carry them.

item.title: 只求曾经拥有，不求天长地久。
item.description:
英文短句：

Better to have loved and lost, than never to have loved at all.

item.title: 我只是一株向日葵，期待着属于自己的那缕阳光。
item.description:
英文短句：

I am just a sunflower, waiting for my only sunshine.

item.title: 不管多努力蜕变成熟，一旦受伤哭泣时，我们还是像个孩子。
item.description:
英文短句：

No matter how hard we try to be mature, we will always be a kid when we all get hurt and cry.

item.title: 我们为什么会跌倒？因为这样才能学会站起来！
item.description:
英文短句：

Why do we fall? So we can learn to pick ourselves up.

item.title: 心如猛虎，细嗅蔷薇；盛宴过后，泪流满面。
item.description:
英文短句：

In me the tiger sniffes the rose, after the feast bursts the tear.

item.title: 其实我不需要一个勋章开证明我是个好人，如果连那样的小女孩都喜欢我，我能坏到哪儿去呢？
item.description:
英文短句：

It turns out I don't need a medal to tell me I'm a good guy. Because of that kid likes me. How bad can I be.

item.title: 有些人只能看到已有的事物，然后只会问为什么会这样？我梦想那些从来没有的事情，然后问为什么不那样？
item.description:
英文短句：

Some men see things as they are and say, why. I dream things that never were and say, why not.

item.title: 你最好给我狠狠的一击，但是我绝不会因此放弃，也绝不可能屈服。
item.description:
英文短句：

Give me your best shot. I'm not gonna give up, I will never give in.

item.title: 我知道再回首时，那些眼泪想来可笑；却不知再回眸时，那些欢声笑语也能叫我潸然泪下。
item.description:
英文短句：

I always knew looking back on the tears would make me laugh, but I never knew looking back on the laughs would make me cry.

item.title: 我用同样的激情去寻求知识。我希望能理解人类的心灵，希望能够知道群星为何闪烁。
item.description:
英文短句：

With equal passion I have sought knowledge. I have wished to understand the hearts of men. I have wished to know why the stars shine.

item.title: 如果你不能飞，那就跑；如果跑不动，那就走；实在走不了，那就爬。无论怎样，你都要勇往直前。
item.description:
英文短句：

You can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.

item.title: 没有人真正看过一朵花，花那么小。我们又没有时间，看花可是要花时间的，就像交朋友也要花时间。
item.description:
英文短句：

Nobody sees a flower really, it is so small. We haven't time, and to see takes time - like to have a friend takes time.

item.title: 只要相信你自己，就没有什么不可能。
item.description:
英文短句：

Nothing is impossible when you believe in yourself.

item.title: 生活意味着进步，进步意味着受苦。
item.description:
英文短句：

Life means progress, and progress means suffering.

item.title: 优于别人，并不高贵。真正的高贵应该是优于过去的自己。
item.description:
英文短句：

There is nothing noble in being superior to some other man. The true nobility is in being superior to your previous self.

item.title: 人的生命，似洪水奔流，不遇岛屿和暗礁，难以激起美丽的浪花。
item.description:
英文短句：

Human life is like flowing water, only when it hits isles and reefs can it create beautiful waves.

item.title: 人生的目标是唯一值得发现的财富。追求你的目标，无论它是什么，都将是稳定和不屈不挠的。
item.description:
英文短句：

An aim in life is the only fortune worth finding. Pursue your object, be it what it will, steadily and indefatigable.

item.title: 不管我们面对什么处境，不管我们的内心多么矛盾，我们总有选择。我们是什么样的人，取决于我们选择做什么样的人。
item.description:
英文短句：

No matter what situation we face, no matter how contradictory our hearts are, we always have a choice. What kind of person we are depends on who we choose to be.

item.title: 记忆是一种相见的形式，忘却是一种解脱的方式。
item.description:
英文短句：

Memory is a kind of want to see, and forgetting is a form of relief.

item.title: 积极的人是幸运的人，当别人只看到刺的时候，他们却可以看到玫瑰。
item.description:
英文短句：

Positive people are lucky people, they can see the roses while others see only the thorns.

item.title: 成功并不是终点，失败也不会致命，真正重要的是继续走下去的勇气。
item.description:
英文短句：

Success is not final, failure is not fatal. It is the courage to continue that counts.

item.title: 信念坚定，如虎添翼。
item.description:
英文短句：

We are twice armed if we fight with faith.

item.title: 林子里有两条路，我选择了行人稀少的那一条，它改变了我的一生。
item.description:
英文短句：

Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.

item.title: 学，然后知不足。
item.description:
英文短句：

The more you study, the more you will find yourself ignorant.

item.title: 吾独爱世间三物：昼之日，夜之月，汝之永恒。
item.description:
英文短句：

I love three things in the world: the sun, the moon, and you. The sun for day, the moon for night, and you forever.

item.title: 人们总是会写一些我的事情。这是他们的事，对我来说，我只需要尽最大努力踢好球。把球踢好就足够了。
item.description:
英文短句：

People are always writing things about me. It is up to them, for me it is not a problem. I will just try to play well and do my best. I am just focused on playing good football.

item.title: 人是生而自由的，却处处受到束缚。
item.description:
英文短句：

Man was born free, and everywhere he is in chains.

item.title: 世上没有绝对的善与恶，差别只在于强者和无法分清事实的弱者。
item.description:
英文短句：

There is no good and evil, there is only power and those too weak to seek it.

item.title: 这样确信无疑的爱，一生只此一次。
item.description:
英文短句：

This kind of certainty comes just once in a lifetime.

item.title: 假如生活欺骗了你，不要悲伤，不要心急！忧郁的日子里须要镇静：相信吧，快乐的日子将会来临！
item.description:
英文短句：

If by life you were deceived, don't be dismal, don't be wild! In the day of grief, be mild. Merry days will come, believe.

item.title: 一个人的人格不取决于他如何享受胜利，而在于这个人如何忍受失败。
item.description:
英文短句：

A person's character is not determined by how he or she enjoys victory, but rather how he or she endures defeat.

item.title: 平凡的脚步也可以走完伟大的行程。
item.description:
英文短句：

Ordinary steps can also take a great trip.

item.title: 坚信的，总会成功。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you have faith, you can do anything.

item.title: 那只是一场比赛，重要的是永不低头。
item.description:
英文短句：

It's just a game, so go and play.

item.title: 你也许会对我们失去信心，但永远不要对你自己失去信心。
item.description:
英文短句：

You may lose faith with us, but never with yourself.

item.title: 自由是做你自己喜欢的事，而幸福却是喜欢你自己做的事。
item.description:
英文短句：

Doing what you like is freedom, liking what you do is happiness.

item.title: 如果你错过我坐的这趟火车，你就该明白我已离去，你可以听见一百里外飘来的汽笛声。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you missed the train I'm on, you will know that I am gone, you can hear the whistle blow a hundred miles.

item.title: 没有人生来就因为肤色去憎恨别人。每个人都可以学会去爱，因为爱自在人心。
item.description:
英文短句：

No one is born hating another person because of the color of his skin. They can be taught to love, for love comes more naturally to the human heart.

item.title: 我发现人是值得活的。若再给我一次生命，我将欣然接受这难得的赐予。
item.description:
英文短句：

I have found it worth living, and would gladly live it again if the chance were offered me.

item.title: 失去深爱的人，我们仍要学会好好的生活。学着放手，微笑着道别，尽管这并不容易。
item.description:
英文短句：

You lost the people you love and you have to find a way to go on. Then let it go and say goodbye with a smile. Although it won't be easy.

item.title: 如果你不出去走走，你就会以为这就是全世界。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you don't go for a walk, you'll think this is the world.

item.title: 我将每天把我的爱情，装进以吻封缄的信封里送给你。
item.description:
英文短句：

I will send you all my love everyday in a letter sealed with a kiss.

item.title: 一粒珍珠，是痛苦围绕着一粒沙子所建造起来的庙宇。
item.description:
英文短句：

A pearl is a temple built by pain around a grain of sand.

item.title: 不是所有有价值的事物都可以被计算，也不是所有可计算的事物都值得去计算。
item.description:
英文短句：

Not everything that counts can be counted, and not everything that's counted truly counts.

item.title: 如果你看到这个世界出了问题，你要么别插手，要么去改变她。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you see something wrong happening in the world, you can either do nothing, or you can do something.

item.title: 我的父亲就是我的英雄，从始至终。
item.description:
英文短句：

My father is my hero, all throughout my life.

item.title: 我只是在必要的时候才会勇敢，勇敢并不代表你要到处闯祸。
item.description:
英文短句：

I am only brave when I have to be. Being brave does not mean you go looking for trouble.

item.title: 天堂地狱都没法给你慰藉，只有我们自己：渺小，孤独，奋斗，与彼此抗争。我向自己祈祷，为自己祈祷。
item.description:
英文短句：

There is no solace above or below. Only us… Small, solitary, battling one another. I pray to myself, for myself.

item.title: 有多大能力就会有多大责任。
item.description:
英文短句：

With great power there must come great responsibility.

item.title: 活着就是为了改变世界。
item.description:
英文短句：

We are here to put a dent in the universe.

item.title: 每个人都是天才。但如果硬要以鱼儿爬树的本领，来评估它的能力，它这辈子都会觉得自己是条蠢鱼。
item.description:
英文短句：

Everyone is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid.

item.title: 没有谁对不起谁，只有谁不懂得珍惜谁。
item.description:
英文短句：

No one is indebted for others, while many people do not know how to cherish others.

item.title: 如果我们把我们的心真正投入到生活之中，那么幸福快乐就总是在我们身边。
item.description:
英文短句：

Happiness is always around us if we put our hearts into life.

item.title: 永远不要忘记你的家人有多爱你。
item.description:
英文短句：

To never forget how much your family loves you.

item.title: 别让你的梦想只成为梦想。
item.description:
英文短句：

Do not let your dream be dream.

item.title: 天下事有难易乎？为之，则难者亦易矣；不为，则易者亦难矣。
item.description:
英文短句：

There is nothing difficult for us to do in the world. If we do it, the difficult thing will be easy; if we do not, the easy thing will be difficult.

item.title: 走的慢不重要，重要的是你不停止。
item.description:
英文短句：

It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

item.title: 若我会见到你，事隔经年。我该如何致意，以眼泪，以沉默。
item.description:
英文短句：

If I should meet thee, after long years. How should I greet thee, with silence and tears.

item.title: 世界总为梦想者让路。
item.description:
英文短句：

The world always makes way for the dreamer.

item.title: 生活从来没有容易的答案，只有去克服重重问题。
item.description:
英文短句：

There are no easy answers, there is only living through the questions.

item.title: 其实，生活就像洋葱，一片一片剥下去，总有一片让你流泪。
item.description:
英文短句：

Truly, life smells like an onion: You peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.

item.title: 童年是金色的田野，是青青的小河，是五彩斑斓的卵石滩。
item.description:
英文短句：

Childhood is the golden field, the green river, and the colorful pebble beach.

item.title: 成功并不在于从不犯错，而在于不重蹈覆辙。
item.description:
英文短句：

Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.

item.title: 生命的意义不仅在于简单的存在与活着，而是去前行、进步、获取和征服。
item.description:
英文短句：

The meaning of life is not simply to exist, to survive, but to move ahead, to go up, to achieve, to conquer.

item.title: 世界上最大的谎言就是你不行。
item.description:
英文短句：

You cannot do it-that is the biggest lie on earth.

item.title: 当你想做成一件事情的时候，全宇宙都会帮助你得到它。
item.description:
英文短句：

When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.

item.title: 把握当下才是真。
item.description:
英文短句：

Only those who capture the moment are real.

item.title: 生活本身就是最美妙的童话故事。
item.description:
英文短句：

Life itself is the most wonderful fairy tale.

item.title: 拥有朋友是最美好的一件事，成为别人的朋友是最美妙的一件事。
item.description:
英文短句：

A friend is one of the nicest things you can have, and one of the best things you can be.

item.title: 繁星纵变，但智慧永恒。
item.description:
英文短句：

The stars change, but the mind remains the same.

item.title: 如果我有八小时砍倒一棵树，我会拿六小时来磨斧头。
item.description:
英文短句：

If I had eight hours to chop down a tree, I would spend six hours sharpening my ax.

item.title: 我不害怕明天，因为我经历过昨天，又热爱今天。
item.description:
英文短句：

I am not afraid of tomorrow for I have seen yesterday and love today.

item.title: 唯有爱可以把黑暗囚在波港湾里。
item.description:
英文短句：

Love is the only thing that holds the dark at bay.

item.title: 我们看起来似乎痛苦的试炼，常常是伪装起来的好运。
item.description:
英文短句：

What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.

item.title: 在遇到梦中人之前，上天也许会安排我们先遇到别的人，在我们终于遇见心仪的人时，便应当心存感激。
item.description:
英文短句：

Maybe God wants us to meet a few wrong people before meeting the right one, so that when we finally meet the person, we will know how to be grateful.

item.title: 爱不是从相互凝视之中获得的，倒是可以由同朝一个方向眺望而产生，这是生活给予我们的教训。
item.description:
英文短句：

Life has taught us that love does not consist in gazing at each other but in looking outward together in the same direction.

item.title: 当你感觉希望不在的时候，看一下自己的内心世界，探寻一下自己的灵魂，你会在你心中找到一个英雄。
item.description:
英文短句：

When you feel like hope is gone, look inside you and search your soul. You will find a hero lies in you.
