item.title: 只要一个人还有追求，他就没有老。直到后悔取代了梦想，一个人才算老。
item.description:
英文短句：

A man is not old as long as he is seeking something. A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.

item.title: 强者能同命运的风暴抗争。
item.description:
英文短句：

A strong man will struggle with the storms of fate.

item.title: 知识是一座城堡，每个人都应为它增砖添瓦。
item.description:
英文短句：

Knowledge is a city to the building of which every human being brought a stone.

item.title: 只要我们还有回忆，昨日仍在。只要我们还有希望，明日尚待。
item.description:
英文短句：

As long as we have memories, yesterday remains. As long as we have hopes, tomorrow awaits.

item.title: 时间可以治愈一颗受伤的心，同样也可以撕裂一颗等待的心。
item.description:
英文短句：

Time can heal a broken heart, but it can also break a waiting heart.

item.title: 回到昨天毫无用处，因为今天的我和过去有所不同。
item.description:
英文短句：

It is no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then.

item.title: 最长的路也有尽头，最黑暗的夜晚也会迎接清晨。
item.description:
英文短句：

The longest way must have its close;the gloomiest night will wear on to a morning.

item.title: 勇气是一切美德攀登的阶梯。
item.description:
英文短句：

Courage is the ladder on which all the other virtues mount.

item.title: 身在井隅，心向璀璨。
item.description:
英文短句：

We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.

item.title: 你天生与众不同,注定不会被淹没在人群中。
item.description:
英文短句：

You are not ordinary, you are born to stand out.

item.title: 眼泪是来自心底却说不出口的话。
item.description:
英文短句：

Tears are words from the heart that can't be spoken.

item.title: 生活不总是完美无缺，轻而易举或者合情合理。但这就是生活的美好之所在。
item.description:
英文短句：

Life isn’t always perfect. Life isn’t always easy. Life doesn’t always make sense. But that’s the beauty of life.

item.title: 老天总是捉弄人，安排了相遇，却又策划了分离。
item.description:
英文短句：

God is always playing tricks on people, arranging them to meet but then to separate.

item.title: 怕什么路途遥远。走一步有一步的风景，进一步有一步的欢喜。
item.description:
英文短句：

Don’t be concerned with the distance of the journey. Every new step provides a new view; every new destination creates new joy.

item.title: 世上唯有贫穷可以不劳而获。
item.description:
英文短句：

Nothing is to be got without pains but poverty.

item.title: 一旦选择做一个阳光，快乐的人，那风雨也只会是让你起舞的理由。
item.description:
英文短句：

When you choose to be a sunny, happy person, a rainstorm becomes just another excuse to dance.

item.title: 重要的是，要选择一个让自己自在的人，因为两个人可能不再缠绵悱恻，却会相守一生。
item.description:
英文短句：

It's important to be with someone who gives you comfort, because love fades, but companionship stays.

item.title: 我们生来就是为了坚持，这样我们才能明白自己是谁。
item.description:
英文短句：

We are made to persist. That's how we find out who we are.

item.title: 黑夜默默地绽放花儿，把赞美留给白昼。
item.description:
英文短句：

The night opens the flowers in secret and allows the day to get thanks.

item.title: 若将人生一分为二，前半段叫做 “不犹豫”，后半段叫做 “不后悔”。
item.description:
英文短句：

If life is divided by two,the former is “no hesitation” and the later is “no regret”.

item.title: 懂道理的人，终会有按下自尊、坦承他犯下严重错误的时刻。
item.description:
英文短句：

Here comes a point when a reasonable man will swallow his pride and admit that he's made a terrible mistake.

item.title: 让我们成为什么样的人，并不是我们的能力，而是我们的选择。
item.description:
英文短句：

It is not our abilities that show what we truly are, it is our choices.

item.title: 爱意味着永远不必说抱歉。
item.description:
英文短句：

Love means never having to say you’re sorry.

item.title: 事情总是在你最不抱期望的时候得到解决，所以，永远不要放弃。
item.description:
英文短句：

Things have a way of working out when you least expect it. Never give it up.

item.title: 春风十里，不及相遇有你； 晴空万里，不及心中有你。
item.description:
英文短句：

Spring breeze miles, less than to meet you; Clear blue skies, not as good as you are in my heart. ​​​​

item.title: 只有勇敢的人才懂得如何宽容；懦夫绝不会宽容，这不是他的本性。
item.description:
英文短句：

Only the brave man know how to tolerance. Coward never tolerant, it is not his nature.

item.title: 爱就是当你坐在他身边，哪怕什么都不做，也会感觉很开心。
item.description:
英文短句：

Love is when you sit beside someone doing nothing yet you feel perfectly happy.

item.title: 真正的胜利是持久的和平，而不是战争。
item.description:
英文短句：

True victory was lasting peace, not war.

item.title: 时间只是一个自称能包治百病的庸医。
item.description:
英文短句：

Time is a self proclaimed quack can cure all diseases.

item.title: 有一种“贫穷”叫短视。
item.description:
英文短句：

There's a kind of poverty called short-sightedness.

item.title: 对朋友爱得越深, 奉承得就越少。
item.description:
英文短句：

The more we love our friends, the less we flatter them.

item.title: 有时候，真的没有下一次，没有暂停继续，没有机会重来。有时候，错过了就永远没机会了。
item.description:
英文短句：

Sometimes there is no next time, no time-outs, no second chances; sometimes it's now or never.

item.title: 音乐要用心灵去听， 用头脑去感觉。
item.description:
英文短句：

In music one must think with the heart and feel with the brains.

item.title: 看到你的那一刻，我爱上了你。你微笑，因为你知道。
item.description:
英文短句：

When I saw you I fell in love. And you smiled because you knew.

item.title: 耽溺回忆不如活在当下，让此刻成为未来荣耀之日。
item.description:
英文短句：

Do not look back and grieve over the past, for it’s gone. Live in the present, and make it so beautiful that it will be worth remembering.

item.title: 在爱的记忆消失以前，请记住我。
item.description:
英文短句：

Remember me before the memory of the love disappears.

item.title: 在差异中寻求彼此的共同点,这就是爱。
item.description:
英文短句：

Love is the power to see similarity in the dissimilar.

item.title: 很多人之所以活得纠结，是因为既想得到别人的认可，却又无法静下心来提升自己！
item.description:
英文短句：

Many people live a tangled life, for they want to gain others’ recognition, but unable to polish themselves peacefully.

item.title: 向上的路，并不拥挤。拥挤是因为，大部分人选择了安逸。
item.description:
英文短句：

It is not crowded on the way up. It is crowded where many people choose to stay within the comfort zone.

item.title: 不要欺骗任何相信你的人，不要相信任何欺骗你的人。
item.description:
英文短句：

Never lie to someone who trust you. Never trust someone who lies to you.

item.title: 偶尔赖赖床，没什么不好。
item.description:
英文短句：

Save some time to be lazy, it's good for you.

item.title: 有时候沉默对我们而言胜过千言万语。
item.description:
英文短句：

Sometimes, the silence seemed to connect us in a way that words never could.

item.title: 善良一点，因为大家的一生都不容易。如果你想真正了解他人，你需要用心去看。
item.description:
英文短句：

Be kind, for everyone is fighting a hard battle. And if you really wanna see what people are, all you have to do is look.

item.title: 我不懂，是我们有着各自不同的命运，还是，我们只不过都是在风中，茫然飘荡。
item.description:
英文短句：

I don't know if we each have a destiny, or if we're all just floating around accident alike on a breeze.

item.title: 在这个世界上，多得是比你丑和比你美的人。所以，不必纠结太多，勇往前行。
item.description:
英文短句：

There will always be prettier and uglier people than you. Accept it and move on.

item.title: 一个人只有用心去看，才能看到真实。事情的真相只用眼睛是看不见的。
item.description:
英文短句：

It is only with the heart that one can see rightly. What's essential is invisible to the eyes.

item.title: 平凡人也能够选择做到不平凡。
item.description:
英文短句：

It is possible for ordinary people to choose to be extraordinary.

item.title: 所谓命运不过是托辞，因为我们无法忍受所有事情发生都是偶然的事实。
item.description:
英文短句：

Destiny is something we've invented because we can't stand the fact that everything that happens is accidental.

item.title: 我们都生活在过往。我们会用一分钟的时间去迷恋一个人，用一小时的时间去喜欢一个人，再用一天的时间去爱上一个人，最终用一辈子的时间去忘记一个人。
item.description:
英文短句：

We all live in the past. We take a minute to have a crush on someone, an hour to like someone, and a day to love someone, but a lifetime to forget someone.

item.title: 有时候人们需要的不是建议，而是能有一个人来倾听和关心自己。
item.description:
英文短句：

Sometimes people don't need advice, they just need someone to listen and care.

item.title: 请仰望星空，而不要俯视脚下。
item.description:
英文短句：

look up at the stars, not down at your feet.

item.title: 勇敢的人随遇而安, 所到之处都是故乡。
item.description:
英文短句：

Every soil,where he is well,is to a valiant man his natural country.

item.title: 我知道这世上有人在等我，尽管我不知道我在等谁。但是因为这样，我每天都非常快乐。
item.description:
英文短句：

I know someone in the world is waiting for me, although I've no idea of who he is. But I feel happy every day for this.

item.title: 爱，就是把那个人的需要，看得比自己还重要。
item.description:
英文短句：

Love is putting someone else's needs before yours.

item.title: 不要害怕黑暗，不要害怕追寻自己的梦想，不要害怕做与众不同的自己，走你自己的路。
item.description:
英文短句：

Don't be afraid of the darkness. Don't be afraid to chase your dreams. Don't be afraid to be yourself. Follow your own path.

item.title: 能够在最美的时光和你相遇，才算没有辜负自己。
item.description:
英文短句：

I don't let myself down, because I have met you in my most gorgeous age.

item.title: 真心朋友总会找机会帮你，假意朋友总会找借口不帮。 ​​​​
item.description:
英文短句：

True friends will always find a way to help you. Fake friends will always find an excuse.

item.title: 栖身之所不一定是家，有人懂你之处才是家。
item.description:
英文短句：

Home is not where you live but where they understand you.

item.title: 有些事情不是看到希望才去坚持，而是坚持了才会看到希望。
item.description:
英文短句：

Some things are not see to insist, but insisted the will see hope.

item.title: 凋谢是真实的，盛开只是一种过去。
item.description:
英文短句：

Fading is true while flowering is past.

item.title: 承诺常常很像蝴蝶，美丽的盘旋后就不见了。
item.description:
英文短句：

Promises are often like the butterfly, which disappear after beautiful hover.

item.title: 交许许多多的朋友不是什么奇迹，真正的奇迹是当所有人都弃你而去的时候，还有一个朋友坚定的站在你这一边。
item.description:
英文短句：

Making a million friends is not a miracle. The miracle is to make a friend who will stand by you when millions are against you.

item.title: 不管你赢了一寸还是一里，赢了就是赢了。
item.description:
英文短句：

It doesn't matter if you win by an inch or a mile. Winning's winning.

item.title: 如果你想要爱情，这就是爱。现实生活就是如此，它不完美，但千真万确。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you want love, then this is it. This is real life. It's not perfect but it's real.

item.title: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。
item.description:
英文短句：

Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting. It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.

item.title: 实现明天理想的唯一障碍是今天的疑虑。
item.description:
英文短句：

The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.

item.title: 家，是爱之所在。也许我们脚步渐远，但心从未离开。
item.description:
英文短句：

Where we love is home, home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts.

item.title: 遇见你是命运的安排，成为了朋友是我的选择，而爱上你是我无法控制的意外。 ​​​​
item.description:
英文短句：

Meeting you was fate, becoming your friend was a choice, but falling in love with you was beyond my control.

item.title: 人人都想要幸福，却不愿承受痛苦。可不经历风雨，怎能见彩虹？
item.description:
英文短句：

Everybody wants happiness. No one wants pain. But how can you make a rainbow without a little rain?

item.title: 有很多别的事情会改变我们，然而我们源于家庭，归于家庭。因此，家人的爱是生命中最大的福分。
item.description:
英文短句：

Other things may change us, but we start and end with family. So, the love of a family is life's greatest blessing.

item.title: 新年是给我们一个新的机会去原谅，去进步，去给予更多，去爱得更多。 ​​​​新年快乐！
item.description:
英文短句：

New Year is about getting another chance. A chance to forgive, to do better, to give more, to love more.Happy New Year！

item.title: 享受生活才是最重要的，要快乐，这样就够了。
item.description:
英文短句：

The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it's all that matters.

item.title: 单身意味着你足够坚强，有足够的耐心去等待值得拥有你的那个人。
item.description:
英文短句：

Being single means that you are strong enough and patient to wait for the one who deserves you.

item.title: 获取幸福最重要的是：有所为，有所爱，有所期待。
item.description:
英文短句：

The grand essentials of happiness are: something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.

item.title: 没有人可以回到过去从头再来，但是每个人都可以从今天开始，创造一个全新的结局。
item.description:
英文短句：

Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.

item.title: 时隔多年，你终于回到故乡，这才发现你想念的不是这个地方，而是你的童年。
item.description:
英文短句：

When you finally go back to your old home, you find it wasn't the old home you missed but your childhood.

item.title: 不要只因一次挫败，就放弃你原来决心想达到的目的。
item.description:
英文短句：

Do not, for one repulse, forgo the purpose that you resolved to effort.

item.title: 有时候，直到一些珍贵的时刻成为了回忆，你才会真正意识到它的价值所在。
item.description:
英文短句：

Sometimes you will never know the true value of a moment until it becomes a memory.

item.title: 家是一个你年轻时想离开，年纪大了又想要回归的地方。
item.description:
英文短句：

Home is a place you grow up wanting to leave, and grow old wanting to get back to.

item.title: 最痛苦的事情是， 在太爱一个人的过程中丧失了自我，忘记了自己也很特别。
item.description:
英文短句：

The most painful thing is losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much, and forgetting that you are special too.

item.title: 你必须努力去寻找自己的声音，因为你越迟开始寻找，找到的可能性越小。
item.description:
英文短句：

You must strive to find your own voice. Because the longer you wait to begin, the less likely you are to find it at all.

item.title: 囫囵吞枣的人生不是成长，成长是对过往经历的的细细品味领会。
item.description:
英文短句：

Our growth depends not on how many experiences we devour, but on how many we digest.

item.title: 人生若只如初见，你衔我一片纯白岁月，我陪你看细水长流。
item.description:
英文短句：

Only if the first sign of life, you said I was a piece of pure time, I accompany you to see.

item.title: 生命太短，没时间留给遗憾。若不是终点，请微笑一直向前。
item.description:
英文短句：

Life is too short to waste on disappointments. If it is not the end, please smile and go straight ahead.

item.title: 真正的朋友绝不会阻挡你的道路，除非你在走下坡路。
item.description:
英文短句：

A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.

item.title: 爱情很难，因为是你，所以再难我都坚持到最后。
item.description:
英文短句：

Love is hard, but the reason I still persist is you.

item.title: 坚持自己的梦想，即使没有翅膀也能飞翔。
item.description:
英文短句：

Hold fast to your dreams and you can soar even without wings.

item.title: 把努力当成你的习惯，而不是一时心血来潮。
item.description:
英文短句：

Take endeavor as a habit instead of temporary passion.

item.title: 让生活变得轻松的三样东西：父母的拥抱、恋人的亲吻，以及朋友的支持。
item.description:
英文短句：

Things that make life easier: a parent's hug, a lover's kiss, and a friend's support.

item.title: 真正的朋友会为你考虑，会担心你，也会和你倾诉他们的忧愁。
item.description:
英文短句：

True friends think about you, worry about you, and tell you when they're worried.

item.title: 人生处处是风景，也处处是陷阱。努力使自己变得强大起来，当风雨来时才能够抵挡。
item.description:
英文短句：

There are both views and traps everywhere in life.Make yourself strong enough to endure impending storms.

item.title: 愿你在迷茫时，坚信你的珍贵，爱你所爱，行你所行，听从你心，无问西东。
item.description:
英文短句：

I truly beg you that you can believe how special you are and love who you really love, do what you should do, follow your heart without caring about practical gains or loss.

item.title: 当你步步高升时，你的朋友知道你是谁；当你每况愈下时，你会知道谁是你的朋友。 ​​​
item.description:
英文短句：

When you rise in life, your friend knows who you are. When you fall down, you know who are your friends.

item.title: 每个失败者都知道成功的方法，只有成功者是按照方法坚持去做。 ​​​​
item.description:
英文短句：

Every loser knows the ways to succeed, but only the successful ones really carry them out persistently.

item.title: 大概没去过的地方都叫远方，没得到的人都比较难忘。
item.description:
英文短句：

Maybe the places that have not been to have been called far away, the people who don't be have are more memorable.

item.title: 我们都有绝望的时候，只有在勇敢面对时，我们才知道我们有多坚强。
item.description:
英文短句：

We all have moments of desperation. But if we can face them head on, that’s when we find out just how strong we really are.

item.title: 接受过去和现在的模样，才会有能量去追寻自己的未来。
item.description:
英文短句：

Accept what was and what is, and you’ll have more positive energy to pursue what will be.

item.title: 穷困潦倒时，要抬头挺胸；春风得意时，要脚踏实地。
item.description:
英文短句：

When you're down and out, remember to keep your head up. When you're up and well, remember to keep your feet down.

item.title: 我们一度梦见彼此是陌生人，醒来时发现彼此是相亲相爱的。
item.description:
英文短句：

Once we dreamt that we were strangers. We wake up to find that we were dear to each other.

item.title: 要是总为过去的事后悔，那你会很难继续前行。不要沉溺于往事。活在当下，看向未来！
item.description:
英文短句：

If you constantly regret things you did or didn't do in the past, then you won't be able to move forward. Don't live in the past. Live in the present…and the future!

item.title: 当你害怕失去一样东西时，这意味着，你要么放弃这样东西，要么放弃你自己。
item.description:
英文短句：

When you are afraid of losing something ,it means that you have no choice but to abandon it or give up yourself.

item.title: 懂得换位思考，人生才会更美好。
item.description:
英文短句：

Life turns out to be better only if you think from others’ perspective.

item.title: 生命中你会遇到两种人：一种是鼓励你的人，一种是打击你的人，最终，这两者都要感谢。 ​​​​
item.description:
英文短句：

You will meet two kinds of people in life: ones who build you up and ones who tear you down. But in the end, you'll thank them both.

item.title: 别哭泣，别叹息，别呻吟；悲伤唤不回流逝的时光。
item.description:
英文短句：

Weep no more, no sigh, nor groan. Sorrow calls no time that’s gone.

item.title: 永远不要把自己的幸福放到别人的手中。
item.description:
英文短句：

Never put your happiness in someone else's hands.

item.title: 我不想要你将就,我也不想成为任何人将就的对象。
item.description:
英文短句：

I don't want to be someone that you're settling for. I don't want to be someone that anyone settles for.

item.title: 请别再欺骗你自己，别让自己活得太累。
item.description:
英文短句：

Please don't deceive yourself. Don't let yourself get too tired.

item.title: 过自己想要的生活不是自私，要求别人按自己的意愿生活才是。
item.description:
英文短句：

Selfishness is not living as one wishes to live, it is asking others to live as one wishes to live.

item.title: 我今天才知道，我之所以漂泊就是在向你靠近。
item.description:
英文短句：

Seems right now, that all I have done in my life was making my way here to you.

item.title: 行为发展成习惯，习惯发展为性格，性格伴随人的一生。
item.description:
英文短句：

Sow an act, and you reap a habit. Sow a habit, and you reap a character. Sow a character, and you reap a destiny.

item.title: 问镜子里的自己，接下来的日子我每天想做什么… 然后去做。
item.description:
英文短句：

Look yourself in the mirror and ask yourself, what do I want to do everyday for the rest of my life … Do that.

item.title: 听我说，朋友，希望是件危险的事。希望能叫人发疯。
item.description:
英文短句：

Let me tell you something my friend: Hope is a dangerous thing. Hope can drive a man insane.

item.title: 不是每件事都解释得通，也不是每件事都必须解释得通。
item.description:
英文短句：

Not everything makes sense. Not everything has to.

item.title: 真正的朋友会接受你的过去，力挺你的现在，鼓舞你的将来。
item.description:
英文短句：

A true friend is someone who accepts your past, supports your present and encourages your future.

item.title: 主宰命运的不是机会，而是选择；机会不是等来的，是争取来的。
item.description:
英文短句：

Destiny is not a matter of chance, it is a matter of choice; it is not a thing to be waited for, it is a thing to be achieved.

item.title: 我有的不是态度，而是一种你无法驾驭的个性。
item.description:
英文短句：

I don’t have an attitude, just a personality you can’t handle.

item.title: 没有人可以回到过去重新开始，但谁都可以从现在开始，书写一个全然不同的结局。
item.description:
英文短句：

Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start now and make a new ending.

item.title: 过去是经历，现在是尝试，未来是期待。用经历尝试就会达到你的期待。
item.description:
英文短句：

Past is experience, present is experiment,and future is expectation. Use your experience for your experiments to achieve your expectation.

item.title: 施人之恩，不发于言。受人之惠，不忘于心。
item.description:
英文短句：

If you helped others, never say it. If you were helped, never forget it.

item.title: 不管你在错的路上已走了多远，必须回头。
item.description:
英文短句：

No matter how far you have gone down the wrong road, turn back.

item.title: 爱不是彼此凝视，而是一起注视同一个方向。
item.description:
英文短句：

Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.

item.title: 只有足够黑暗的时候，才能看见星星。
item.description:
英文短句：

When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.

item.title: 你没有成功因为你不知道你想要什么或你想要的还不够强烈。
item.description:
英文短句：

You do not succeed because you do not know what you want or you don't want it intensely enough.

item.title: 愿你所有的圣诞梦想都成真！
item.description:
英文短句：

Hope all your Christmas dreams come true!
